I jedem i pijem dok ne postane različita ti iz Crna nit [od noći] belim koncem od zore. Zatim dovršite postu do zalaska sunca. I nemaju odnose sa njima sve dok ne mogu da ostanem moliti u džamija. Ove su granice [postavljenih pomoću] Allah, tako da ih ne prilazite. Tako da li Alah pravi jasnu njegove uredbe ljudima da mogu da postanu pravedni.

trans-unit.source: And do not consume one another's wealth unjustly or send it [in bribery] to the rulers in order that [they might aid] you [to] consume a portion of the wealth of the people in sin, while you know [it is unlawful].
trans-unit.target: I ne konzumiraju jedan drugome bogatstva nepravedno ili ga poslati [u podmićivanje] vladari redom da [oni možda pomoći] da konzumiraju deo bogatstvo naroda u grehu, dok vi znate za [to je nezakonit].

trans-unit.source: They ask you, [O Muhammad], about the new moons. Say, "They are measurements of time for the people and for Hajj." And it is not righteousness to enter houses from the back, but righteousness is [in] one who fears Allah. And enter houses from their doors. And fear Allah that you may succeed.
trans-unit.target: Oni te, [O Muhammad], o new meseca. Kažu, "Oni su mjerenja vremena za ljude i za Hajj." I to nije pravednost da unesete kuće od pozadi, ali pravednost je [u] osobi koja se ne boji Alaha. I unesite kuća od vrata. I strah od Alaha da te mogu uspeti.

trans-unit.source: Fight in the way of Allah those who fight you but do not transgress. Indeed. Allah does not like transgressors.
trans-unit.target: Se bori na Alahovom putu, oni koji se borim sa tobom, ali ne nevaljali. Zaista. Allah ne voli greљnici.

trans-unit.source: And kill them wherever you overtake them and expel them from wherever they have expelled you, and fitnah is worse than killing. And do not fight them at al-Masjid al- Haram until they fight you there. But if they fight you, then kill them. Such is the recompense of the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: I ubiti ih, gde god da si ih pretekni ih izbacim iz gde god oni vas prognali i fitnah je gore od ubijanja. I ne bori se ih u al-dћamiju al - Haram dok se ne bore li se tamo. Ali ako su se borim sa tobom, onda ih ubiti. Takva je kompenzaciju za skeptike.

trans-unit.source: And if they cease, then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: A ako oni prestanu, onda zaista, Allah je Forgiving i milosrdna.

trans-unit.source: Fight them until there is no [more] fitnah and [until] worship is [acknowledged to be] for Allah. But if they cease, then there is to be no aggression except against the oppressors.
trans-unit.target: Da se borimo dok ne postoji fitnah nema [Više] i [do] molitvu je [priznat] za Alaha. Ali ako oni prestanu, onda postoji da bude bez agresije, osim na tlaиitelje.

trans-unit.source: [Fighting in] the sacred month is for [aggression committed in] the sacred month, and for [all] violations is legal retribution. So whoever has assaulted you, then assault him in the same way that he has assaulted you. And fear Allah and know that Allah is with those who fear Him.
trans-unit.target: [Borbe u] sveti mesec je za [agresije počinjene u] sveti mesec, i za [sve] kršenje je legalno odmazde. Pa ko god te je napao, a onda ga je napala na isti način na koji je napao te je. I strah Alaha, i znam da je Allah sa onima koji ga se boje.

trans-unit.source: And spend in the way of Allah and do not throw [yourselves] with your [own] hands into destruction [by refraining]. And do good; indeed, Allah loves the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: I provesti na Alahovom putu i ne bacaj [se] [svojim] rukama u propast [uzdržavanjem]. A dobar; Uistinu, Allah voli akciju toga dobrog.

trans-unit.source: And complete the Hajj and 'umrah for Allah. But if you are prevented, then [offer] what can be obtained with ease of sacrificial animals. And do not shave your heads until the sacrificial animal has reached its place of slaughter. And whoever among you is ill or has an ailment of the head [making shaving necessary must offer] a ransom of fasting [three days] or charity or sacrifice. And when you are secure, then whoever performs 'umrah [during the Hajj months] followed by Hajj [offers] what can be obtained with ease of sacrificial animals. And whoever cannot find [or afford such an animal] - then a fast of three days during Hajj and of seven when you have returned [home]. Those are ten complete [days]. This is for those whose family is not in the area of al-Masjid al-Haram. And fear Allah and know that Allah is severe in penalty.
trans-unit.target: I dovršite Hajj i ' umrah za Alaha. Ali ako vas nemogućnost, zatim [ponuda] šta se može dobiti sa lakoćom žrtvenih životinja. A brijanje glave dok žrtvenih životinja je dostigla svoje mesto pokolja. A ko od vas je bolestan ili ima medikamentima glave [Pravljenje brijanje neophodno mora ponuditi] otkup posni [tri dana] ili dobrotvorne svrhe ili žrtva. I kada si siguran, onda onaj ko obavlja ' umrah [tokom Hajj meseci] praćen Hajj [ponude] šta se može dobiti sa lakoćom žrtvenih životinja. I ko god nije moguće pronaći [ili priuštiti takvu životinja] - a onda brzim tri dana tokom Hajj i sedam godina kada ste se vratili [kuci]. To su deset kompletan [dana]. Ovo je za one čija je porodica nije u oblasti al-dћamiju al-Haram. I strah Alaha, i znam da je Allah ozbiljne u kaznu.

trans-unit.source: Hajj is [during] well-known months, so whoever has made Hajj obligatory upon himself therein [by entering the state of ihram], there is [to be for him] no sexual relations and no disobedience and no disputing during Hajj. And whatever good you do - Allah knows it. And take provisions, but indeed, the best provision is fear of Allah. And fear Me, O you of understanding.
trans-unit.target: Hajj je tokom poznati meseci, tako da ko god je napravio Hajj obavezno na sebe u tome [unošenjem stanje ihram], [da za njega] nema seksualne odnose i nema neposlušnosti i to je nesumnjivo tokom Hajj. I Kakvo god dobro da jeste - Allah to zna. I uzmi odredbe, ali zaista, najbolji pružanje je strah od Allaha. I mene, O ti o razumevanju.

trans-unit.source: There is no blame upon you for seeking bounty from your Lord [during Hajj]. But when you depart from 'Arafat, remember Allah at al- Mash'ar al-Haram. And remember Him, as He has guided you, for indeed, you were before that among those astray.
trans-unit.target: Ne krivim vas traži nadoknadu od svoga gospodara [tokom Hajj] ne postoji. Ali kada planirate iz ' Arafat, zapamti Allah u al - Mash'ar al-Haram. I zapamtite da ga, on me je doveo, jer zaista, bio si pre toga među onima na odmet.

trans-unit.source: Then depart from the place from where [all] the people depart and ask forgiveness of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Onda krenuti iz mesta gde [] svi odlaze i traži oproštaj od Alaha. Uistinu, Allah je Forgiving i milosrdna.

trans-unit.source: And when you have completed your rites, remember Allah like your [previous] remembrance of your fathers or with [much] greater remembrance. And among the people is he who says, "Our Lord, give us in this world," and he will have in the Hereafter no share.
trans-unit.target: I kad ste završili svoje obrede, zapamti Allah kao tvoj [prethodne] spomen tvojih otaca ili sa [mnogo] veća pamćenja. Među ljudima je onaj koji kaže, "Gospod, daj nam na ovom svetu" i on će imati nikakav deo na drugom svetu.

trans-unit.source: But among them is he who says, "Our Lord, give us in this world [that which is] good and in the Hereafter [that which is] good and protect us from the punishment of the Fire."
trans-unit.target: Ali među njima je onaj koji kaže, "Gospod, daj nam na ovom svetu [koja je] dobro i na drugom svetu [koja je] dobar i zaštiti nas od kazne vatre."

trans-unit.source: Those will have a share of what they have earned, and Allah is swift in account.
trans-unit.target: Oni će imati pravo na šta su zaradili, a Allah je brz u nalog.

trans-unit.source: And remember Allah during [specific] numbered days. Then whoever hastens [his departure] in two days - there is no sin upon him; and whoever delays [until the third] - there is no sin upon him - for him who fears Allah. And fear Allah and know that unto Him you will be gathered.
trans-unit.target: I upamtite Allah [određenim] numerisane danima. Onda ko god ћuri njegov odlazak u dva dana - ne postoji greh nad njim; i ko god odlaže [do treći] - ne postoji greh nad njim - za njega, ko se ne boji Alaha. I strah Alaha, i znam da mu ti biti prikupljene.

trans-unit.source: And of the people is he whose speech pleases you in worldly life, and he calls Allah to witness as to what is in his heart, yet he is the fiercest of opponents.
trans-unit.target: I naroda on čiji govor te zadovoljava u zemaljski život, i on zove Allah svedoci o tome šta mu je u srcu, ali on je najžešći protivnici.

trans-unit.source: And when he goes away, he strives throughout the land to cause corruption therein and destroy crops and animals. And Allah does not like corruption.
trans-unit.target: I kada on ode, borio se širom zemlje da se u tome da izazove korupcije i unište useve i životinje. A Allah ne voli korupcije.

trans-unit.source: And when it is said to him, "Fear Allah," pride in the sin takes hold of him. Sufficient for him is Hellfire, and how wretched is the resting place.
trans-unit.target: I kada ga je da mu rekao, "Allah strah", ponos u greh obuzima ga. Dovoljno za njega je Paklena vatra, a kako jadna je mijesto gde.

trans-unit.source: And of the people is he who sells himself, seeking means to the approval of Allah. And Allah is kind to [His] servants.
trans-unit.target: I od ljudi je ko prodaje sebe, traže sredstva za odobravanje od Alaha. I, Alah je ljubazna prema [svoje] sluge.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, enter into Islam completely [and perfectly] and do not follow the footsteps of Satan. Indeed, he is to you a clear enemy.
trans-unit.target: O koji veruju, unesete u Islam potpuno [i savršeno] i ne prati u stope Satane. On je zaista vam jasno neprijatelja.

trans-unit.source: But if you deviate after clear proofs have come to you, then know that Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise.
trans-unit.target: Ali ako odstupite nakon jasne dokaze da ti, onda znam da Allah veliиa snagom i mudar.

trans-unit.source: Do they await but that Allah should come to them in covers of clouds and the angels [as well] and the matter is [then] decided? And to Allah [all] matters are returned.
trans-unit.target: Da čekaju ali taj Alah treba da im u omote od oblaka i anđeli [pa], a bilo je [tadašnji] odlučio? A Alahu [sve] stvari su se vratili.

trans-unit.source: Ask the Children of Israel how many a sign of evidence We have given them. And whoever exchanges the favor of Allah [for disbelief] after it has come to him - then indeed, Allah is severe in penalty.
trans-unit.target: Pitaj decu Izraela koliko znak dokaze dali smo im. I ko god razmenjuje uslugu i Allah [za neverovanje] nakon to je privuklo ga - onda zaista, Allah je jak u kaznu.

trans-unit.source: Beautified for those who disbelieve is the life of this world, and they ridicule those who believe. But those who fear Allah are above them on the Day of Resurrection. And Allah gives provision to whom He wills without account.
trans-unit.target: Najulepšavana za one koji su upravljali je život ovog sveta, i oni ruglu oni koji veruju. Ali onima koji se boje Allah iznad njih na dan uskrsnuća. A Allah daje odredbe kojima je Willis bez naloga.

trans-unit.source: Mankind was [of] one religion [before their deviation]; then Allah sent the prophets as bringers of good tidings and warners and sent down with them the Scripture in truth to judge between the people concerning that in which they differed. And none differed over the Scripture except those who were given it - after the clear proofs came to them - out of jealous animosity among themselves. And Allah guided those who believed to the truth concerning that over which they had differed, by His permission. And Allah guides whom He wills to a straight path.
trans-unit.target: Ljudski rod je bio od jedne religije [pred njihovim devijacija]; Onda je Allah poslao proroke kao donosioce radosne i samo ideja i poslao sa njima Svetog pisma u istini da sudim između naroda koje se odnose na to u kojoj su se razlikovali. I niko nije razlikovao preko Svetog pisma, osim onih koji su mogli da ga - nakon što jasan dokaz je došla na njih - iz ljubomoran animozitet među sobom. I, Alah vođena oni koji veruju da istinu u pogledu onoga nad kojima su imali razlikovao, od strane njegove dozvole. I Allah vodi koga je volja da pravolinijsku putanju.

trans-unit.source: Or do you think that you will enter Paradise while such [trial] has not yet come to you as came to those who passed on before you? They were touched by poverty and hardship and were shaken until [even their] messenger and those who believed with him said, "When is the help of Allah?" Unquestionably, the help of Allah is near.
trans-unit.target: Ili misliš li da će uneti raj dok [sud] nije stigao da si došao do onih koji su postavili pred vama? Oni su bili dirnuti od preleteo i poljuljane do [ni njihove] messenger i oni koji su verovali s njim rekao: "Kada je pomoć od Alaha?" Bez sumnje, Alahovom pomoći je blizu.

trans-unit.source: They ask you, [O Muhammad], what they should spend. Say, "Whatever you spend of good is [to be] for parents and relatives and orphans and the needy and the traveler. And whatever you do of good - indeed, Allah is Knowing of it."
trans-unit.target: Su te pitali, [O Muhammad], treba da provedu. "Kako god provodite dobra je [da] za roditelje i rodbinu i siročad i u nevolji i putnik. "I raditi od dobar - zaista, Allah je znati za to."

trans-unit.source: Fighting has been enjoined upon you while it is hateful to you. But perhaps you hate a thing and it is good for you; and perhaps you love a thing and it is bad for you. And Allah Knows, while you know not.
trans-unit.target: Borba je bio nametnut nad vama dok ga je odvratna za tebe. Ali možda vi mrzite stvar i to je dobro za vas; i možda ti ljubav stvar i ne valja za tebe. A Allah zna, dok vi ne znate.

trans-unit.source: They ask you about the sacred month - about fighting therein. Say, "Fighting therein is great [sin], but averting [people] from the way of Allah and disbelief in Him and [preventing access to] al-Masjid al-Haram and the expulsion of its people therefrom are greater [evil] in the sight of Allah. And fitnah is greater than killing." And they will continue to fight you until they turn you back from your religion if they are able. And whoever of you reverts from his religion [to disbelief] and dies while he is a disbeliever - for those, their deeds have become worthless in this world and the Hereafter, and those are the companions of the Fire, they will abide therein eternally.
trans-unit.target: Nisu pitali za sveti mesec - o borbi u tome. Recimo, "borbe u tome pra [greh], ali želi čuti [ljudi] od puta Alah i neverovanje u njega i [sprečava pristup] al-dћamiju al-Haram i proterivanja njegovih građana vladini su veća [zlo] na vidiku od Alaha. A fitnah je veća od ubijanja. " I oni će nastaviti da se borim sa tobom, sve dok su te vratimo iz svoje vere ako su u stanju. I ko god od vas se vraća iz njegove religije [u neverici] i umre, dok je on ne veruje - za one, njihovim delima postao beskoristan u ovom svetu i nadalje, a to su Kompanjoni vatre, oni će trpe u tome beskrajno.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and those who have emigrated and fought in the cause of Allah - those expect the mercy of Allah. And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Uistinu, one koji veruju i onih koji su emigrirali i borio se u uzrok Allah - oni očekivati milost Alahova. A Allah je Forgiving i milosrdna.

trans-unit.source: They ask you about wine and gambling. Say, "In them is great sin and [yet, some] benefit for people. But their sin is greater than their benefit." And they ask you what they should spend. Say, "The excess [beyond needs]." Thus Allah makes clear to you the verses [of revelation] that you might give thought.
trans-unit.target: Pitaju te o vinu i kockanje. Rekao je, "u njima je veliki greh i [a ipak, neki] korist za ljude. Ali njihov greh je veći od izražaja." I onda se treba da provedu. Reci, "ostatke [izvan potrebe]." Stoga Allah jasno ukazuje da te stihove [otkrovenja] da dajete misao.

trans-unit.source: To this world and the Hereafter. And they ask you about orphans. Say, "Improvement for them is best. And if you mix your affairs with theirs - they are your brothers. And Allah knows the corrupter from the amender. And if Allah had willed, He could have put you in difficulty. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise.
trans-unit.target: Na ovom svetu i nadalje. I nisu pitali za siročad. "Poboljšanje za njih je najbolja. I ako pomeљaљ svoje poslove sa njihovim - oni su tvoja braća. I Allah zna za kvarim dobrice iz na amender. I ako Alah imao volje, mogao je da stavi si u problemima. Uistinu, Allah veliиa snagom i mudar.

trans-unit.source: And do not marry polytheistic women until they believe. And a believing slave woman is better than a polytheist, even though she might please you. And do not marry polytheistic men [to your women] until they believe. And a believing slave is better than a polytheist, even though he might please you. Those invite [you] to the Fire, but Allah invites to Paradise and to forgiveness, by His permission. And He makes clear His verses to the people that perhaps they may remember.
trans-unit.target: Ali ne i politeistički žene dok ne postanu vernici. I robinju verovanje je bolje nego u polytheist, iako ona bi mogli da te. Ali ne i politeistički ljudi [tvoje žene] dok ne postanu vernici. I verovanje Rob je bolje nego u polytheist, iako bi mogli da te. Oni vas pozivaju [] u vatru, ali Allah poziva u raj i da oprost, od strane njegove dozvole. I on postaje jasnija njegovih stihova s ljudima koji možda mogu da se setim.

trans-unit.source: And they ask you about menstruation. Say, "It is harm, so keep away from wives during menstruation. And do not approach them until they are pure. And when they have purified themselves, then come to them from where Allah has ordained for you. Indeed, Allah loves those who are constantly repentant and loves those who purify themselves."
trans-unit.target: I onda se zbog menstruacije. "To je zlo, da se tako dalje od žene tokom menstruacije. I ne prilazite im dok god su cista. I kada su sami ћivi.i, zatim da im se iz gde je Alah zaredio za tebe. Uistinu, Allah voli one koji se stalno kaje i voli one koji prociscavaju sebe."

trans-unit.source: Your wives are a place of sowing of seed for you, so come to your place of cultivation however you wish and put forth [righteousness] for yourselves. And fear Allah and know that you will meet Him. And give good tidings to the believers.
trans-unit.target: Tvoje žene su mesto za sejanje semena za tebe, pa hajde kod vas na uzgajanje Međutim želite a onda to prosirili [pravednost] za sebe. I strah Alaha, i znam da ti se sresti. I daj radosne vernici.

trans-unit.source: And do not make [your oath by] Allah an excuse against being righteous and fearing Allah and making peace among people. And Allah is Hearing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: I nemojte da [zakletvu do] Allah izgovor protiv biti pravedni i bogobojaћljiv Alah i sklapanje mira među ljudima. A Allah je sluh i znajuжi.

trans-unit.source: Allah does not impose blame upon you for what is unintentional in your oaths, but He imposes blame upon you for what your hearts have earned. And Allah is Forgiving and Forbearing.
trans-unit.target: Alah ne nameće krivicu na vas za koja je slučajno u tvoje zakletve, ali on nameće krivicu na vas za šta vam srca zaradio. A Allah je Forgiving i Forbearing.

trans-unit.source: For those who swear not to have sexual relations with their wives is a waiting time of four months, but if they return [to normal relations] - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Za one koji se kunu da nije imao seksualne odnose sa svojim ženama je vremenom čekanja od 4 meseca, ali ako se vrate [u normalne odnose] - tada zaista, Allah je Forgiving i milosrdna.

trans-unit.source: And if they decide on divorce - then indeed, Allah is Hearing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: A ako se odluče na razvod - zaista, Allah je sluh i znajuжi.

trans-unit.source: Divorced women remain in waiting for three periods, and it is not lawful for them to conceal what Allah has created in their wombs if they believe in Allah and the Last Day. And their husbands have more right to take them back in this [period] if they want reconciliation. And due to the wives is similar to what is expected of them, according to what is reasonable. But the men have a degree over them [in responsibility and authority]. And Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise.
trans-unit.target: Razvedeni žene ostaju u čeka tri perioda, a to nije po zakonu da ih sakriti kako bi Allah je stvorio u njihovim utrobama ako veruju u Allaha i poslednji dan. A njihovi muževi više pravo da ih uzmem u ovom periodu ako žele pomirenje. I zbog supruge liči na što se očekuje od njih, prema onome što je razumno. Ali ljudi imati diplomu preko njih [u odgovornost i ovlaštenje]. I, Alah veliиa snagom i mudar.

trans-unit.source: Divorce is twice. Then, either keep [her] in an acceptable manner or release [her] with good treatment. And it is not lawful for you to take anything of what you have given them unless both fear that they will not be able to keep [within] the limits of Allah. But if you fear that they will not keep [within] the limits of Allah, then there is no blame upon either of them concerning that by which she ransoms herself. These are the limits of Allah, so do not transgress them. And whoever transgresses the limits of Allah - it is those who are the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: Razvod je dva puta. Onda, ili da ostane [] na prihvatljiv način ili osloboditi [je] sa dobar tretman. I to nije po zakonu da li da uzmem nešto za šta ste dali ih osim ako obojica strahuju da će biti u stanju da zadržite unutar granica Allah. Ali ako te strah da ne će ostati unutar granica Allah, nema krivice na bilo koga od njih u pogledu onoga po kojem ona ransoms sama. Ovo su granice od Alaha, tako da ih ne nevaljali. I ko god transgresses granicama Allah - onima koji su počinioce.

trans-unit.source: And if he has divorced her [for the third time], then she is not lawful to him afterward until [after] she marries a husband other than him. And if the latter husband divorces her [or dies], there is no blame upon the woman and her former husband for returning to each other if they think that they can keep [within] the limits of Allah. These are the limits of Allah, which He makes clear to a people who know.
trans-unit.target: A ako je razveden je [po treći put], onda ona nije zakoniti da ga posle toga sve do [posle] uda za muža osim njega. I ako ovo drugo muž razvede od nje [umre], nema krivice na žena i njen bivši muž za povraćaj jedni drugima, ako oni misle da oni mogu da [] u granicama od Alaha. Ovo su granice od Alaha, što jasno ukazuje da ljudi koji znaju.

trans-unit.source: And when you divorce women and they have [nearly] fulfilled their term, either retain them according to acceptable terms or release them according to acceptable terms, and do not keep them, intending harm, to transgress [against them]. And whoever does that has certainly wronged himself. And do not take the verses of Allah in jest. And remember the favor of Allah upon you and what has been revealed to you of the Book and wisdom by which He instructs you. And fear Allah and know that Allah is Knowing of all things.
trans-unit.target: I kada ti se razvesti od žene i [skoro] ispune svog mandata, ili će ih zadržati po prihvatljivim uslovima ili objaviti ih po prihvatljivim uslovima, i ne zadržavaj ih, imaju nameru zlo, da pokleknu [protiv njih]. I ko god to radi je svakako nepravdu sebe. I ne uzimajte stihove od Alaha u šali. I zapamti uslugu od Alaha ti, i šta je tebi knjigu i mudrost po kojoj on ne naredi otkriven. I strah Alaha, i znam da je Allah znajuжi od svih stvari.

trans-unit.source: And when you divorce women and they have fulfilled their term, do not prevent them from remarrying their [former] husbands if they agree among themselves on an acceptable basis. That is instructed to whoever of you believes in Allah and the Last Day. That is better for you and purer, and Allah knows and you know not.
trans-unit.target: I kada ti se razvesti od žene i ispune svoj mandat, ne sprečavaju ih ponovnoj muћevima [bivšeg] ako se slože među sobom na prihvatljivom nivou. To je naredio da ko god od vas veruje u Allaha i poslednji dan. To je bolje za tebe i иistiji, a Allah zna i da ne.

trans-unit.source: Mothers may breastfeed their children two complete years for whoever wishes to complete the nursing [period]. Upon the father is the mothers' provision and their clothing according to what is acceptable. No person is charged with more than his capacity. No mother should be harmed through her child, and no father through his child. And upon the [father's] heir is [a duty] like that [of the father]. And if they both desire weaning through mutual consent from both of them and consultation, there is no blame upon either of them. And if you wish to have your children nursed by a substitute, there is no blame upon you as long as you give payment according to what is acceptable. And fear Allah and know that Allah is Seeing of what you do.
trans-unit.target: Majke mogu dojiti svoju decu dva dovršite godinama za onaj ko želi da završi u staračkom [periodu]. Ocu je odredba sa majkama i njihove odeće prema onome što je prihvatljivo. Osoba ne tarifira se sa više od njegovog kapaciteta. Nijedna majka treba da bude naudili kroz svoje dete, i nema oca kroz njegovo dete. I nad [otac] naslednik je je dužnost kao [od oca]. I da oboje imaju weaning kroz obostranog pristanka od oboje i konsultacija, nema krivice na bilo koga od njih. I ako želite da imate svoju decu Stolareva zamena, nema krivice na vas sve dok dajete plaćanja prema onome što je prihvatljivo. I strah Alaha, i znam da je Alah kod onoga sto radite.

trans-unit.source: And those who are taken in death among you and leave wives behind - they, [the wives, shall] wait four months and ten [days]. And when they have fulfilled their term, then there is no blame upon you for what they do with themselves in an acceptable manner. And Allah is [fully] Acquainted with what you do.
trans-unit.target: I oni koji su odveli u smrt medju vama i ostavim žene iza - oni, [supruge, da] cekaj 4 meseca i deset [dana]. I kada se ispune svoj mandat, a onda nema krivice na vas što rade sa sebe na prihvatljiv način. I, Alah [potpuno] je da se upozna sa onim što radite.

trans-unit.source: There is no blame upon you for that to which you [indirectly] allude concerning a proposal to women or for what you conceal within yourselves. Allah knows that you will have them in mind. But do not promise them secretly except for saying a proper saying. And do not determine to undertake a marriage contract until the decreed period reaches its end. And know that Allah knows what is within yourselves, so beware of Him. And know that Allah is Forgiving and Forbearing.
trans-unit.target: Postoji nema krivice na vas za to na koju [indirektno] aludirate kada je u pitanju predlog da se žene ili šta prikrivaš unutar sebe. Allah zna da ćete ih imati na umu. Ali ne obeжavam ih tajno osim rekavši Hera. I ne utvrdi da preduzme bračni ugovor dok naredbi perioda dostigne svoj kraj. I znam da je Allah zna sta je u vama samima, pa budi oprezan sa njim. I znam da je Allah Forgiving i Forbearing.

trans-unit.source: There is no blame upon you if you divorce women you have not touched nor specified for them an obligation. But give them [a gift of] compensation - the wealthy according to his capability and the poor according to his capability - a provision according to what is acceptable, a duty upon the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Ima nema krivice na vas, ako vas razvede od žene ti nije dodirnuo niti naveden za njih obavezu. Ali daj im [dar] naknadu – bogate prema njegovu sposobnost i siromašnima prema njegovu sposobnost - odredbu prema onome što je prihvatljivo, dužnost na akciju toga dobrog.

trans-unit.source: And if you divorce them before you have touched them and you have already specified for them an obligation, then [give] half of what you specified - unless they forego the right or the one in whose hand is the marriage contract foregoes it. And to forego it is nearer to righteousness. And do not forget graciousness between you. Indeed Allah, of whatever you do, is Seeing.
trans-unit.target: A ako ti ih razvod, pre nego što si ih dotakao i već ste naveli za njih obavezu, onda [Daj] pola sta ste naveli - osim ako oni odreknu prava ili onaj u čije ruke je brak ugovor foregoes to. I da se odreknem ga bliže pravednosti. I ne zaboravi plemenitost izmedju vas. Zaista Allah, od raditi, da vidimo.

trans-unit.source: Maintain with care the [obligatory] prayers and [in particular] the middle prayer and stand before Allah, devoutly obedient.
trans-unit.target: Održavanje sa brigom [obavezna] molitve i [posebno] srednji molitvu i stoje ispred Alaha, pobožno poslušna.

trans-unit.source: And if you fear [an enemy, then pray] on foot or riding. But when you are secure, then remember Allah [in prayer], as He has taught you that which you did not [previously] know.
trans-unit.target: A ako te strah [neprijatelja, onda Moli] na stopalo ili jahanje. Ali kad su sigurne, tada pridržavajte Allah [u molitvi], naucio si je to što si uradio ne [ranije] znam.

trans-unit.source: And those who are taken in death among you and leave wives behind - for their wives is a bequest: maintenance for one year without turning [them] out. But if they leave [of their own accord], then there is no blame upon you for what they do with themselves in an acceptable way. And Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise.
trans-unit.target: I one koji su zauzeti u smrt medju vama i ostaviti žene iza - zbog svoje žene je sume: održavanje na godinu dana bez [ih] odvijaju. Ali ako napuste [svojevoljno], tu je i ne krivim te radi sa sebe u prihvatljiv način. I, Alah veliиa snagom i mudar.

trans-unit.source: And for divorced women is a provision according to what is acceptable - a duty upon the righteous.
trans-unit.target: A za razvedene žene je odredba prema onome što je prihvatljivo - dužnost na pravedne.

trans-unit.source: Thus does Allah make clear to you His verses that you might use reason.
trans-unit.target: Prema tome da li Allah ti razjasniti njegovih stihova da biste mogli da koristite razlog.

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered those who left their homes in many thousands, fearing death? Allah said to them, "Die"; then He restored them to life. And Allah is full of bounty to the people, but most of the people do not show gratitude.
trans-unit.target: Da niste uzeli u obzir one koji su napustili svoje domove u mnogo hiljada, strahujući od smrti? Allah je rekao da ih, "Umri"; Onda on ih je vraćeno život. I Allah je puna na ucenjene glave ljudima, ali većina ljudi ne pokazuju zahvalnost.

trans-unit.source: And fight in the cause of Allah and know that Allah is Hearing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: I boriti za Alaha i znam da je Allah sluh i znajuжi.

trans-unit.source: Who is it that would loan Allah a goodly loan so He may multiply it for him many times over? And it is Allah who withholds and grants abundance, and to Him you will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Ko je to što bi pozajmiti Allah je dobar kredit tako da on može pomnožite ga za njega mnogo puta preko? To je Alah koji zadržava i daje izobilje i da ga ti će biti vraćena.

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered the assembly of the Children of Israel after [the time of] Moses when they said to a prophet of theirs, "Send to us a king, and we will fight in the way of Allah "? He said, "Would you perhaps refrain from fighting if fighting was prescribed for you?" They said, "And why should we not fight in the cause of Allah when we have been driven out from our homes and from our children?" But when fighting was prescribed for them, they turned away, except for a few of them. And Allah is Knowing of the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: Nisi razmislio skupštini decu Izrael posle [Vrijeme] Moses kad su rekli da prorok njihova "Pošalji nam kralj, a mi će se bori na Alahovom putu"? On je rekao, "Bi ti možda se uzdrži od borbi ako borba je prepisan za tebe?" Rekli su, "i zašto se nismo borili u uzrok Allah kada smo isterani napolje iz naše domove i naša deca?" Ali kada se bore je prepisan za njih, odbili su, osim nekoliko njih. A Allah je znajuжi za počinioce.

trans-unit.source: And their prophet said to them, "Indeed, Allah has sent to you Saul as a king." They said, "How can he have kingship over us while we are more worthy of kingship than him and he has not been given any measure of wealth?" He said, "Indeed, Allah has chosen him over you and has increased him abundantly in knowledge and stature. And Allah gives His sovereignty to whom He wills. And Allah is all-Encompassing [in favor] and Knowing."
trans-unit.target: I njihov prorok je rekao da je za njih, "zaista, Allah je poslao da Saul kao kralj." Rekli su, "Kako je imati kraljevanje nad nama dok smo je vrednije od kraljevanje od njega, a on ne dobije bilo koju meru bogatstva?" On je rekao, "zaista, Allah ga je odabrao nad vama i povećao ga jasno stavila do znanja i ugleda. A Allah daje njegov suverenitet kome je volja. A Allah je sveobuhvatajućeg [u korist] i znajuжi."

trans-unit.source: And their prophet said to them, "Indeed, a sign of his kingship is that the chest will come to you in which is assurance from your Lord and a remnant of what the family of Moses and the family of Aaron had left, carried by the angels. Indeed in that is a sign for you, if you are believers."
trans-unit.target: I njihov prorok je rekao da je za njih, "zaista, znak njegovo kraljevanje je da grudi će doći da te u kojoj je garancije od svoga gospodara i ostatak šta porodice Moses i porodica od Aaron je ostalo, nošena anđelima. Zaista u to je znak za vas, ako ste vi vernici."

trans-unit.source: And when Saul went forth with the soldiers, he said, "Indeed, Allah will be testing you with a river. So whoever drinks from it is not of me, and whoever does not taste it is indeed of me, excepting one who takes [from it] in the hollow of his hand." But they drank from it, except a [very] few of them. Then when he had crossed it along with those who believed with him, they said, "There is no power for us today against Goliath and his soldiers." But those who were certain that they would meet Allah said, "How many a small company has overcome a large company by permission of Allah. And Allah is with the patient."
trans-unit.target: I kad Sol bila napred-nazad sa vojnicima, rekao je: "zaista, Allah će biti testiranje te sa reke. Tako da onaj ko se napije iz nje nije od mene, i ko god to ne ima ukus je zaista od mene, osim jednog koji uzima [iz toga] u Boћja ruka." Ali oni su pili iz njega, osim za [] nekoliko njih. A onda kad je prešao je zajedno sa ostalima koji su verovali s njim, rekli su, "nema za nas danas protiv Golijata i njegovih vojnika." Ali oni koji su bili sigurni da su upoznati Alah rekao: "Koliko mala firma ima veliku kompaniju obuzet dozvolu od Alaha. A Allah je sa pacijentom."

trans-unit.source: And when they went forth to [face] Goliath and his soldiers, they said, "Our Lord, pour upon us patience and plant firmly our feet and give us victory over the disbelieving people."
trans-unit.target: I kada su išle napred-nazad [suočavaju] Golijata i njegovih vojnika, rekli su, "Gospod, sipaj nad nama strpljenje i podmetne čvrsto noge i daj nam pobedu nad disbelieving narod."

trans-unit.source: So they defeated them by permission of Allah, and David killed Goliath, and Allah gave him the kingship and prophethood and taught him from that which He willed. And if it were not for Allah checking [some] people by means of others, the earth would have been corrupted, but Allah is full of bounty to the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Tako da su ih porazili uz dozvolu od Alaha, David je ubio Golijata i Allah mu je dao kraljevanje i prophethood i naučio ga od toga kome on volje. I ako nije bilo Allah provera [] neki od strane znači drugih, zemlja bi oštećene, ali Allah je pun nagrada da svetova.

trans-unit.source: These are the verses of Allah which We recite to you, [O Muhammad], in truth. And indeed, you are from among the messengers.
trans-unit.target: Ovo su stihovi od Alaha koje recitujemo tebi, [O Muhammad], istina je. I zaista, ti si neku od vesnici.

trans-unit.source: Those messengers - some of them We caused to exceed others. Among them were those to whom Allah spoke, and He raised some of them in degree. And We gave Jesus, the Son of Mary, clear proofs, and We supported him with the Pure Spirit. If Allah had willed, those [generations] succeeding them would not have fought each other after the clear proofs had come to them. But they differed, and some of them believed and some of them disbelieved. And if Allah had willed, they would not have fought each other, but Allah does what He intends.
trans-unit.target: Tih glasnika - neki od njih mi je izazvalo da premaši drugima. Među njima su oni kojima Allah govorio, a on podigao neke od njih stepena. Dali smo Isus, sin Mary, jasne dokaze i podržali smo ga sa cisti duh. Ako Alah imao volje, te generacije ih uspem bi ne bi ni borili jedni drugima nakon što je jasan dokaz je došao do njih. Ali su izrazili različita mišljenja, a neki su verovali, a neki od njih ne veruje. I ako Alah imao volje, oni bi ne bi ni borili jedni druge, ali Allah radi sta mu treba.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, spend from that which We have provided for you before there comes a Day in which there is no exchange and no friendship and no intercession. And the disbelievers - they are the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: O ti koji veruju, provesti od onog koji smo ti našli novac pre nego što dođe dan u kojem je bez exchange "i" nema prijateljstva "i" Nema zalaganja. I skeptike - oni su počinioce.

trans-unit.source: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of [all] existence. Neither drowsiness overtakes Him nor sleep. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Who is it that can intercede with Him except by His permission? He knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them, and they encompass not a thing of His knowledge except for what He wills. His Kursi extends over the heavens and the earth, and their preservation tires Him not. And He is the Most High, the Most Great.
trans-unit.target: Allah - nema nema boћanstvo osim njega, Ever-ћivima, na odrћavanja dinamike [sve] postojanja. Ni pospanost nadvlada ga, ni spavati. Njemu pripada šta god je na nebesima, i šta god je na zemlji. Ko li je to da joj pomogne s njim osim do njegove dozvole? On zna šta je [trenutno] pred njima i šta će biti za njima, a oni obuhvatati ništa od njegova znanja osim šta je volja. Njegov سک30 se proteže preko nebesa i zemlju, a njihova očuvanja umori ga ne. I on je na vrlo visoko, u velikoj.

trans-unit.source: There shall be no compulsion in [acceptance of] the religion. The right course has become clear from the wrong. So whoever disbelieves in Taghut and believes in Allah has grasped the most trustworthy handhold with no break in it. And Allah is Hearing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Bice da tu nema prisile u [prihvatanja] religiju. Ispravna stvar je postala jasna iz krivu. Tako da ko god disbelieves u Taghut i veruje u Alaha je zgrabio poverenja za ruku sa bez pauze u njemu. A Allah je sluh i znajuжi.

trans-unit.source: Allah is the ally of those who believe. He brings them out from darknesses into the light. And those who disbelieve - their allies are Taghut. They take them out of the light into darknesses. Those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide eternally therein.
trans-unit.target: Alah je saveznik onih koji veruju. On dovodi ih iz moje.i u svetlo. A oni koji je siguran da je lažna - njihovi saveznici su Taghut. Oni ih ne preuzme 149 moje.i. To su Kompanjoni vatre; Oni će zauvek u tome da trpe.

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered the one who argued with Abraham about his Lord [merely] because Allah had given him kingship? When Abraham said, "My Lord is the one who gives life and causes death," he said, "I give life and cause death." Abraham said, "Indeed, Allah brings up the sun from the east, so bring it up from the west." So the disbeliever was overwhelmed [by astonishment], and Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.
trans-unit.target: Zar nisi razmislio onaj koji se raspravljali sa Abrahamom svog gospodara [samo] jer mu je Alah dao kraljevstvo? Kada je Abraham je rekao, "Moj gospodar je onaj koji daje život i uzroka smrti," rekao je, "ja dati život i izazvati smrt." Abraham je rekao: "zaista, Allah nas dovodi do sunce sa istoka, pa ispljuni sa zapada." Tako je sada bio preplavljen [zaprepašćenje] i Alah ne povede malverzacijama narod.

trans-unit.source: Or [consider such an example] as the one who passed by a township which had fallen into ruin. He said, "How will Allah bring this to life after its death?" So Allah caused him to die for a hundred years; then He revived him. He said, "How long have you remained?" The man said, "I have remained a day or part of a day." He said, "Rather, you have remained one hundred years. Look at your food and your drink; it has not changed with time. And look at your donkey; and We will make you a sign for the people. And look at the bones [of this donkey] - how We raise them and then We cover them with flesh." And when it became clear to him, he said, "I know that Allah is over all things competent."
trans-unit.target: Ili [razmotriti takav primer] kao onaj koji je prolazio pored township koja je pala u propast. Rekao je: "Kako će Allah ovo doneli život nakon svoje smrti?" Tako je Allah izazvalo da umre za stotinu godina; Onda on ga povratili. On je rekao, "koliko si ostao?" Čovek je rekao, "Ovo mi je potrebno par dana deo dana." Rekao je: "radije, ostao si stotinu godina. Pogledaj tvoju hranu i tvoje piće; To se nije promenilo sa vremenom. A pogledaj tvoj magarac; i vodili ste znak za ljude. I pogledaj kosti [Ovaj magarac] - kako smo odrastali i onda ih pokrivamo sa mesom." I kad je postalo jasno da ga, on je rekao, "Znam da Alah je preko nadležnih svih stvari."

trans-unit.source: And [mention] when Abraham said, "My Lord, show me how You give life to the dead." [Allah] said, "Have you not believed?" He said, "Yes, but [I ask] only that my heart may be satisfied." [Allah] said, "Take four birds and commit them to yourself. Then [after slaughtering them] put on each hill a portion of them; then call them - they will come [flying] to you in haste. And know that Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise."
trans-unit.target: I spomenuo kad Abraham je rekao, "moj gospodaru, pokaži mi kako da ožive mrtvih." [Allah] je rekao, "Ti nije verovao?" On je rekao, "da, ali [pitam] samo to moje srce može biti zadovoljan." [Allah] je rekao, "Uzmi četiri ptice i njima posvetiti sebi. Zatim [posle ih kolju] stavi na svakom brdu deo njih; Onda ih zovi - će dolete [] da ti na brzinu. I znam da je Allah izmorenom u moć i mudar."

trans-unit.source: The example of those who spend their wealth in the way of Allah is like a seed [of grain] which grows seven spikes; in each spike is a hundred grains. And Allah multiplies [His reward] for whom He wills. And Allah is all-Encompassing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Na primer od onih koji provode svoje bogatstvo na Alahovom putu je kao zrno [zrna] koje raste sedam bodlji; u svakoj Spajk je stotinu zrna. I, Alah množi svoju nagradu za koga je volja. A Allah je sveobuhvatajućeg i znanja.

trans-unit.source: Those who spend their wealth in the way of Allah and then do not follow up what they have spent with reminders [of it] or [other] injury will have their reward with their Lord, and there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve.
trans-unit.target: Onih koji provede svoje bogatstvo na Alahovom putu, i onda ne prati se šta su provele sa podsetnike [to] ili [druge] povreda biti nagrađeni sa svog gospodara, i će biti bez straha u vezi sa njima, niti će oni tugovati.

trans-unit.source: Kind speech and forgiveness are better than charity followed by injury. And Allah is Free of need and Forbearing.
trans-unit.target: Dobar govor i oprost su bolji od dobrotvorne svrhe praćen povreda. A Allah je slobodno po potrebi i Forbearing.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not invalidate your charities with reminders or injury as does one who spends his wealth [only] to be seen by the people and does not believe in Allah and the Last Day. His example is like that of a [large] smooth stone upon which is dust and is hit by a downpour that leaves it bare. They are unable [to keep] anything of what they have earned. And Allah does not guide the disbelieving people.
trans-unit.target: O ti koji veruju, ne pobijaju dobrotvornog rada sa podsetnike ili povrede kao onaj koji provodi svoje bogatstvo [samo] da ih vide ljudi radi i ne veruje u Allaha i poslednji dan. Njegov primer je kao onaj od [veliki] glatko kamen na kojem je prah i je pogođena samo par kapljica ostavlja golim. Oni nisu u mogućnosti [da] nešto za šta su zaradili. I, Alah ne vodi disbelieving ljude.

trans-unit.source: And the example of those who spend their wealth seeking means to the approval of Allah and assuring [reward for] themselves is like a garden on high ground which is hit by a downpour - so it yields its fruits in double. And [even] if it is not hit by a downpour, then a drizzle [is sufficient]. And Allah, of what you do, is Seeing.
trans-unit.target: I primer onih koji provode svoje bogatstvo traže sredstva za odobravanje od Alaha i osiguravajući [nagradu za] je sebe kao vrt na visokoj zemlji koja je pogođena samo par kapljica - pa njega proizilazi svoje voće u duplo. A [i] da je ne pogodi samo par kapljica, onda kaplje [je dovoljan]. I, Alah, što vi radite, da vidimo.

trans-unit.source: Would one of you like to have a garden of palm trees and grapevines underneath which rivers flow in which he has from every fruit? But he is afflicted with old age and has weak offspring, and it is hit by a whirlwind containing fire and is burned. Thus does Allah make clear to you [His] verses that you might give thought.
trans-unit.target: Jedan od vas rado da imamo svoj vrt palme i vinova loza ispod koje poteku u koje on ima iz svakog voća? Ali on je izmučen s godinama i ima slaba potomstva i to je pogođena vihor koji sadrže vatru i da je spalio. Tako da li Alah pravi jasnu [njegove] te stihove da ti možda dati mislio.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, spend from the good things which you have earned and from that which We have produced for you from the earth. And do not aim toward the defective therefrom, spending [from that] while you would not take it [yourself] except with closed eyes. And know that Allah is Free of need and Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: O ti koji veruju, provesti iz dobre stvari koje si zaradio i ono što smo napravili za vas iz zemlje. I cilj nije ka neispravnom vladini, potrošnja [iz toga], dok ti to više neće da [se] osim sa zatvorenim očima. I znam da je Allah slobodno po potrebi i Praiseworthy.

trans-unit.source: Satan threatens you with poverty and orders you to immorality, while Allah promises you forgiveness from Him and bounty. And Allah is all-Encompassing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Sotona ti preti siromaštva i ti naređuje da nemorala, dok Allah obećava oprost od njega i nagrada. A Allah je sveobuhvatajućeg i znanja.

trans-unit.source: He gives wisdom to whom He wills, and whoever has been given wisdom has certainly been given much good. And none will remember except those of understanding.
trans-unit.target: On daje mudrost kome on Willis, i ko god dobije mudrost je sigurno dao mnogo dobrog. I nijedan će zapamtiti osim onih o razumevanju.

trans-unit.source: And whatever you spend of expenditures or make of vows - indeed, Allah knows of it. And for the wrongdoers there are no helpers.
trans-unit.target: I šta god ti provesti rashoda ili napraviti zakletvi - zaista, Allah ne zna za to. I za počinioce ne postoje ni pomagači.

trans-unit.source: If you disclose your charitable expenditures, they are good; but if you conceal them and give them to the poor, it is better for you, and He will remove from you some of your misdeeds [thereby]. And Allah, with what you do, is [fully] Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: Ako obelodanite svoje milosrdno izdataka, oni su dobri; Ali, ako bi ih prikriti i im dati sirotinji, to je bolje za tebe, i on će ukloniti iz te neke od tvoje nedela [Time]. I, Alah, sa onim što radite, je [u potpunosti] upoznata.

trans-unit.source: Not upon you, [O Muhammad], is [responsibility for] their guidance, but Allah guides whom He wills. And whatever good you [believers] spend is for yourselves, and you do not spend except seeking the countenance of Allah. And whatever you spend of good - it will be fully repaid to you, and you will not be wronged.
trans-unit.target: Nije na tebi, [O Muhammad], je [odgovornost za] njihove savete, ali Allah vođice, koga je volja. Štagod dobro [vernici] provodite je za sebe i ne provodite osim tražeći drћanjem Allah. Kako god provodite dobra - u potpunosti za otplatu s tobom, a ne će biti prevarena.

trans-unit.source: [Charity is] for the poor who have been restricted for the cause of Allah, unable to move about in the land. An ignorant [person] would think them self-sufficient because of their restraint, but you will know them by their [characteristic] sign. They do not ask people persistently [or at all]. And whatever you spend of good - indeed, Allah is Knowing of it.
trans-unit.target: [Dobrotvorne svrhe je] za siromašne koji su zabranjene za uzrok Alaha, ne mogu pomjeriti u zemlji. Neuki [osoba] bi ih samodovoljna zbog njihove uzdržanost, ali ih znati njihovu znakom [karakteristika]. Ne pitaju ljudi uporno [ili uopšte]. I šta god ti provesti od dobar - zaista, Allah je znati za to.

trans-unit.source: Those who spend their wealth [in Allah 's way] by night and by day, secretly and publicly - they will have their reward with their Lord. And no fear will there be concerning them, nor will they grieve.
trans-unit.target: Oni koji provode svoje bogatstvo [na Alahovom putu] noću i danju, tajno i javno - oni biti nagrađeni sa svog gospodara. I bez straha će tamo biti u vezi sa njima, niti će oni tugovati.

trans-unit.source: Those who consume interest cannot stand [on the Day of Resurrection] except as one stands who is being beaten by Satan into insanity. That is because they say, "Trade is [just] like interest." But Allah has permitted trade and has forbidden interest. So whoever has received an admonition from his Lord and desists may have what is past, and his affair rests with Allah. But whoever returns to [dealing in interest or usury] - those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide eternally therein.
trans-unit.target: Podnosim onih koji konzumiraju interesovanje [na dan uskrsnuća] osim kao jedan tribine koji je da ga pobedi Sotona u ludilo. To je zato što oni kažu, "trgovina je [samo] kao interes." Ali, Allah je dozvolio trgovinu i zabranjeno je interes. Pa ko god da je dobila je upozorenje od svog gospodara i desists možda ima koja je pored i njegovoj aferi leži Alaha. Ali ko god daje da [se bavi i kamatu ili zelenaљtvo] - to su Kompanjoni vatre; Oni će zauvek u tome da trpe.

trans-unit.source: Allah destroys interest and gives increase for charities. And Allah does not like every sinning disbeliever.
trans-unit.target: Allah uništava kamatu i daje povećanje u dobrotvorne svrhe. A Allah ne voli svako greљnoj ne veruje.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who believe and do righteous deeds and establish prayer and give zakah will have their reward with their Lord, and there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve.
trans-unit.target: Zaista, oni koji veruju da pravedni dela uspostavi molitvu i i dati zakah biti nagrađeni sa svog gospodara, i će biti bez straha u vezi sa njima, niti će oni tugovati.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, fear Allah and give up what remains [due to you] of interest, if you should be believers.
trans-unit.target: O ti koji veruju, strah Alaha i odustati od kakve ostatke [zbog te] od interesa, da si bio vernici.

trans-unit.source: And if you do not, then be informed of a war [against you] from Allah and His Messenger. But if you repent, you may have your principal - [thus] you do no wrong, nor are you wronged.
trans-unit.target: A ako ne, onda se informisali o rat [protiv tebe] od Alaha, i njegovog glasnika. Ali ako se kajete, možda tvoj direktor - [tako] te da je, niti su ti nepravdu.

trans-unit.source: And if someone is in hardship, then [let there be] postponement until [a time of] ease. But if you give [from your right as] charity, then it is better for you, if you only knew.
trans-unit.target: A ako je neko u teškoćama, [neka bude] odlaganje do [u doba] jednostavan. Ali ako ti dam [iz tvoje pravo kao] dobrotvorne svrhe, a onda ga je bolje za tebe, kad bi samo znao.

trans-unit.source: And fear a Day when you will be returned to Allah. Then every soul will be compensated for what it earned, and they will not be treated unjustly.
trans-unit.target: I strah na dan kada si će biti vraćen za Alaha. Onda svaka duša će se nadoknadi šta to zaradio, i oni će se nanositi nepravda.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, when you contract a debt for a specified term, write it down. And let a scribe write [it] between you in justice. Let no scribe refuse to write as Allah has taught him. So let him write and let the one who has the obligation dictate. And let him fear Allah, his Lord, and not leave anything out of it. But if the one who has the obligation is of limited understanding or weak or unable to dictate himself, then let his guardian dictate in justice. And bring to witness two witnesses from among your men. And if there are not two men [available], then a man and two women from those whom you accept as witnesses - so that if one of the women errs, then the other can remind her. And let not the witnesses refuse when they are called upon. And do not be [too] weary to write it, whether it is small or large, for its [specified] term. That is more just in the sight of Allah and stronger as evidence and more likely to prevent doubt between you, except when it is an immediate transaction which you conduct among yourselves. For [then] there is no blame upon you if you do not write it. And take witnesses when you conclude a contract. Let no scribe be harmed or any witness. For if you do so, indeed, it is [grave] disobedience in you. And fear Allah. And Allah teaches you. And Allah is Knowing of all things.
trans-unit.target: O ti koji veruju, kada ugovorom dug za navedeni pojam, zapisao. I neka pisar napisao [] između vas u pravdu. Da nema pisar odbijaju da pišite kao Alah učio ga. Neka pišem i neka onaj koji je na obavezu diktirati. I neka se bojim se Allah, njegov gospodar, i da ne ostavi ništa od toga. Ali ako je taj koji ima obavezu je od ograničen razumevanje, ili slab ili nije u mogućnosti da diktira sebe, onda neka njegov staratelj diktiranje u pravdu. I ponesi prisustvovati dva svedoka među svojim ljudima. I ako tamo nisu dvojicu [dostupna], a zatim čoveka i dve žene od onih protiv kojih se prihvatite kao svedoci - tako da ako zena greљi, onda i drugi mogu pamtiti. I neka ne svedoci odbiti kada su pozvani na. Trиaжe [i] pisati o tome, da li je mali ili veliki, za svog [navedeni] mandata. To je pravednije pred Alaha i jača kao dokaz i verovatnije da biste sprečili sumnje između vas, osim kad treba hitno transakcija koje rade se među sobom. [Onda] je nema krivice na vas ako ga ne pišete. I povedi svedoka kada ti zaključi ugovor. Pusti pisara nemam stradati ili neki svedok. Jer, ako ti to, zaista, to je [grob] neposlušnosti u tebi. I bojim se Alahu. I, Alah te je predaje. A Allah je znajuжi svih stvari.

trans-unit.source: And if you are on a journey and cannot find a scribe, then a security deposit [should be] taken. And if one of you entrusts another, then let him who is entrusted discharge his trust [faithfully] and let him fear Allah, his Lord. And do not conceal testimony, for whoever conceals it - his heart is indeed sinful, and Allah is Knowing of what you do.
trans-unit.target: I ako ste na putu, a ne može da pronađe pisar, a zatim depozit [bi trebalo da] uzeo. I ako neko od vas poverava njegovo drugo, onda neka koji je predao otpust mu verovati [verno] i neka strah Allah, njegov gospodar. Da sakrije iskaz, za onaj ko skriva to - njegovo srce je zaista grešno i Allah je znajuжi onoga sto radite.

trans-unit.source: To Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth. Whether you show what is within yourselves or conceal it, Allah will bring you to account for it. Then He will forgive whom He wills and punish whom He wills, and Allah is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: Alah pripada šta god je na nebesima, i šta god da je u zemlju. Da li ti pokazati šta je unutar sebe ili ga sakrije, Allah doneće pravdanje za to. Onda on oprostiti koju je volja, i koga je volja, i Allah je gotovo sve nadležne kazni.

trans-unit.source: The Messenger has believed in what was revealed to him from his Lord, and [so have] the believers. All of them have believed in Allah and His angels and His books and His messengers, [saying], "We make no distinction between any of His messengers." And they say, "We hear and we obey. [We seek] Your forgiveness, our Lord, and to You is the [final] destination."
trans-unit.target: Glasnik veruje u šta je otkriveno da ga od svog gospodara, a [i] vernici. Sve njih da verujemo u Alaha i svoje andjele i njegove knjige i njegove glasnike, [ukazujući], "Mi ne pravimo razliku između svih svog kurira." I govore: "čujemo i pokoravamo. [Traženje smo] Tvoj oprost, Gospod, a tebi je do [odrediљta]. "

trans-unit.source: Allah does not charge a soul except [with that within] its capacity. It will have [the consequence of] what [good] it has gained, and it will bear [the consequence of] what [evil] it has earned. "Our Lord, do not impose blame upon us if we have forgotten or erred. Our Lord, and lay not upon us a burden like that which You laid upon those before us. Our Lord, and burden us not with that which we have no ability to bear. And pardon us; and forgive us; and have mercy upon us. You are our protector, so give us victory over the disbelieving people."
trans-unit.target: Alah ne naplaćuje nikome osim [time unutar] svojih kapaciteta. To će imati [posledice] [kakve] je stekla, i to će nositi [posledice] [zlo] osvojio. "Gospod, ne nameću krivicu na nas ako smo zaboravili ili pogrešilo. Lord, a ne pred nama je ležao teret tako što ste postavili nad onima pred nama. Gospod, i nas optereжuje nije ono što mi imamo sposobnost da podnese. I oprosti nam; i oprosti nam; i smiluj se na nas. Ti si nam zaљtitnik, zato nam dajte pobedu nad disbelieving narod."

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Meem.
trans-unit.target: Alif, Lam, Meem.

trans-unit.source: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence.
trans-unit.target: Allah - nema nema boћanstvo osim njega, Ever-ћivima, na odrћavanja dinamike postojanja.

trans-unit.source: He has sent down upon you, [O Muhammad], the Book in truth, confirming what was before it. And He revealed the Torah and the Gospel.
trans-unit.target: Poslao je na vas, [O Muhammad], knjiga u istini, potvrđujući kako je ranije bilo. I on je otkrio Toru i Bibliju.

trans-unit.source: Before, as guidance for the people. And He revealed the Qur'an. Indeed, those who disbelieve in the verses of Allah will have a severe punishment, and Allah is exalted in Might, the Owner of Retribution.
trans-unit.target: Ranije, kao vodič za ljude. I on je otkrio je Kuran. Zaista, oni koji sumnjaš u stihove Allaha će imati ozbiljne kazne, a Allah veliиa snagom, vlasnik osvete.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, from Allah nothing is hidden in the earth nor in the heaven.
trans-unit.target: Zaista, od Alaha ništa je skrivena u zemlji, ni u raju.

trans-unit.source: It is He who forms you in the wombs however He wills. There is no deity except Him, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: On je taj koji ti se formira u utrobe koliko god mu je volja. Tamo je nema boћanstvo osim njega, Exalted u moć, mudri.

trans-unit.source: It is He who has sent down to you, [O Muhammad], the Book; in it are verses [that are] precise - they are the foundation of the Book - and others unspecific. As for those in whose hearts is deviation [from truth], they will follow that of it which is unspecific, seeking discord and seeking an interpretation [suitable to them]. And no one knows its [true] interpretation except Allah. But those firm in knowledge say, "We believe in it. All [of it] is from our Lord." And no one will be reminded except those of understanding.
trans-unit.target: On je taj koji je poslao da te, [O Muhammad], knjiga; u to su stihovi [to su] precizan - oni su temelj knjige - i drugi ste nejasni. Što se tiče onih u čija srca je devijacija [istina], to je taj koji je ste nejasni, težeći nesloge i traže je interpretacija [pogodni za njih] će prate. I niko ne zna njegovo [istina] tumačenje osim Alaha. Ali ta firma u znanje je rekao, "mi verujemo u to. "Sve [to] je od Gospoda." I niko neće se oglasiti osim onih o razumevanju.

trans-unit.source: [Who say], "Our Lord, let not our hearts deviate after You have guided us and grant us from Yourself mercy. Indeed, You are the Bestower.
trans-unit.target: [Koji] "Gospod, da ga ne ne nam srca nastrani posle tebe usmeravala nas i daj nam od sebe milost. Zaista, ti si na Bestower.

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, surely You will gather the people for a Day about which there is no doubt. Indeed, Allah does not fail in His promise."
trans-unit.target: Gospod, sigurno te će se okupiti ljudi na dan, o kojoj nema nikakve sumnje. Zaista, Allah ne izgube u njegovo obećanje."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who disbelieve - never will their wealth or their children avail them against Allah at all. And it is they who are fuel for the Fire.
trans-unit.target: Zaista, onima koji je siguran da je lažna - nikada njihovo bogatstvo ili njihova deca je uzaludno ih Allah uopšte. I oni su ti koji su goriva za vatru.

trans-unit.source: [Theirs is] like the custom of the people of Pharaoh and those before them. They denied Our signs, so Allah seized them for their sins. And Allah is severe in penalty.
trans-unit.target: [Njihova je] kao prilagođena naroda faraona i onih pre njih. Odbili su nam znakove, tako da ih je Alah zauzeli za svoje grehe. A Allah je ozbiljan u kaznu.

trans-unit.source: Say to those who disbelieve, "You will be overcome and gathered together to Hell, and wretched is the resting place."
trans-unit.target: Reci onima koji je siguran da je lažna, "ti se prevazići i okupili se u pakao, i jadna je mijesto gde."

trans-unit.source: Already there has been for you a sign in the two armies which met - one fighting in the cause of Allah and another of disbelievers. They saw them [to be] twice their [own] number by [their] eyesight. But Allah supports with His victory whom He wills. Indeed in that is a lesson for those of vision.
trans-unit.target: Već bilo je za vas bio znak u dve armije koja je upoznala - jedna borba u uzrok Alaha, i još jedan od skeptike. Videli su ih [da] dvaput sopstvene [] broj od strane [njihov] vid. Ali Allah podržava sa svoje pobede, koga je volja. Zaista u to je lekcija za one s vizijom.

trans-unit.source: Beautified for people is the love of that which they desire - of women and sons, heaped-up sums of gold and silver, fine branded horses, and cattle and tilled land. That is the enjoyment of worldly life, but Allah has with Him the best return.
trans-unit.target: Najulepšavana za ljude je ljubav ono što oni žele - žena i sinovi, navukao vrat-up sume zlato i srebro, fino brendirani konje, a goveda i obrađivana zemlja. To je uživanje u zemaljski život, ali Allah, najbolji vratila se s njim.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Shall I inform you of [something] better than that? For those who fear Allah will be gardens in the presence of their Lord beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally, and purified spouses and approval from Allah. And Allah is Seeing of [His] servants -
trans-unit.target: Reci, "Ja ga obavestiti o [nešto] bolje od toga? Za one koji strahuju da bi Alah biće vrtovima kod gospodara ispod kojih reke teku, u kojima su beskrajno trpe i proиiљжen supružnika, a odobrenje od Alaha. I Allah vidi [njegove] službenika-

trans-unit.source: Those who say, "Our Lord, indeed we have believed, so forgive us our sins and protect us from the punishment of the Fire,"
trans-unit.target: One koji kažu, "Gospod, zaista smo verovali, pa oprosti nam naše grehe i zaštiti nas od kazne vatre"

trans-unit.source: The patient, the true, the obedient, those who spend [in the way of Allah], and those who seek forgiveness before dawn.
trans-unit.target: Pacijent, pravi, je poslušna, onima koji provode [na Alahovom putu] i onima koji traže oprost pre zore.

trans-unit.source: Allah witnesses that there is no deity except Him, and [so do] the angels and those of knowledge - [that He is] maintaining [creation] in justice. There is no deity except Him, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Alah svedoka da ne postoji ni Bog osim njega, a [i] anđeli i onih znanja - [koja je] održanja [stvaranje] u pravdu. Tamo je nema boћanstvo osim njega, Exalted u moć, mudri.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the religion in the sight of Allah is Islam. And those who were given the Scripture did not differ except after knowledge had come to them - out of jealous animosity between themselves. And whoever disbelieves in the verses of Allah, then indeed, Allah is swift in [taking] account.
trans-unit.target: Zaista, religija u prizor Allah je Islam. I oni koji su dobili pismo se ne razlikuje mnogo osim nakon što je znanje ih - se obratio iz ljubomoran animozitet između sebe. I ko god disbelieves u stihove od Alaha, onda zaista, Allah je brz u [preduzimanje] nalog.

trans-unit.source: So if they argue with you, say, "I have submitted myself to Allah [in Islam], and [so have] those who follow me." And say to those who were given the Scripture and [to] the unlearned, "Have you submitted yourselves?" And if they submit [in Islam], they are rightly guided; but if they turn away - then upon you is only the [duty of] notification. And Allah is Seeing of [His] servants.
trans-unit.target: Pa, ako su sa tobom prepucavati, recimo, "sam se povinovao Allah [u Islamu], a [i] one koji me prate." I reci onima koji su dobili pismo i [da] kako, "te predalo je sebe?" I ako ih predaju [u Islamu], oni su s pravom Vođena; Ali ako okrenu - onda vas je samo [dužnosti] obaveštenje. A Allah je viđenje [svoje] sluge.

trans-unit.source: Those who disbelieve in the signs of Allah and kill the prophets without right and kill those who order justice from among the people - give them tidings of a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Oni koji sumnjaš u znacima od Alaha i ubiti proroke bez prava i ubiti one koji pravdu iz naroda - da im damo vas bolje nagraditi za bolna kazna.

trans-unit.source: They are the ones whose deeds have become worthless in this world and the Hereafter, and for them there will be no helpers.
trans-unit.target: Oni su ti čije dela postao beskoristan u ovom svetu i nadalje, i za njih će postojati bez pomagači.

trans-unit.source: Do you not consider, [O Muhammad], those who were given a portion of the Scripture? They are invited to the Scripture of Allah that it should arbitrate between them; then a party of them turns away, and they are refusing.
trans-unit.target: Ne smatrate li, [O Muhammad], oni koji su dobili deo Svetog pisma? Oni su pozvani da Sveto pismo Allah, koji je trebalo da arbitrira između njih; Onda ne odbija zabavu od njih, a oni odbijaju.

trans-unit.source: That is because they say, "Never will the Fire touch us except for [a few] numbered days," and [because] they were deluded in their religion by what they were inventing.
trans-unit.target: To je zato što su reci, "nikada ne će vatra dodir nas osim [koji] numerisane dan", i [jer] su bili u zabludi u svoju religiju, šta su bili stvorivљi.

trans-unit.source: So how will it be when We assemble them for a Day about which there is no doubt? And each soul will be compensated [in full for] what it earned, and they will not be wronged.
trans-unit.target: I kako će to biti kada sklapamo ih na dan, o kojima ne postoji sumnja? I svaka duša će dobiti nadoknadu [u potpunosti za] šta je zaradila, i oni će biti prevarena.

trans-unit.source: Say, "O Allah, Owner of Sovereignty, You give sovereignty to whom You will and You take sovereignty away from whom You will. You honor whom You will and You humble whom You will. In Your hand is [all] good. Indeed, You are over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: Rekao je, "O Allah, vlasnik suverenitet, daj suverenitet kome hoćeš i uzmete suverenitet od koga li će. Koga li će i kome će vas ponizi иast. [Sve] dobro je u tvojoj ruci. Zaista, ti si preko nadležnih sve stvari.

trans-unit.source: You cause the night to enter the day, and You cause the day to enter the night; and You bring the living out of the dead, and You bring the dead out of the living. And You give provision to whom You will without account."
trans-unit.target: Da izazove te noći da unesete na dan, i uzrokujete dan da unesete noći; i donesi dnevnu iz mrtvih, i ti i mrtve iz žive. A ti odredba kome hoćeš bez računa."

trans-unit.source: Let not believers take disbelievers as allies rather than believers. And whoever [of you] does that has nothing with Allah, except when taking precaution against them in prudence. And Allah warns you of Himself, and to Allah is the [final] destination.
trans-unit.target: Neka ne vernici uzeti skeptike kao saveznici, a ne kao vernici. I ko god [da] to radi, nema nikakve Alah, osim kada uzimanje predostrožnosti protiv njih u razboritost. Allah upozorava vas u sebe, i da Allah je do [odrediљta].

trans-unit.source: Say, "Whether you conceal what is in your breasts or reveal it, Allah knows it. And He knows that which is in the heavens and that which is on the earth. And Allah is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: Reci, "bilo da prikrije šta je u tvoje grudi ili to otkrije, Allah to zna. I on zna da je koji u nebesa i ono što je na zemlji. A Allah je preko nadležnih sve stvari.

trans-unit.source: The Day every soul will find what it has done of good present [before it] and what it has done of evil, it will wish that between itself and that [evil] was a great distance. And Allah warns you of Himself, and Allah is Kind to [His] servants."
trans-unit.target: Dan svaka duša će naći od dobar poklon [pre nego što to] što je učinio i što je učinio zlo, to je želja da se između sebe, a to [zlo] bila velike udaljenosti. Allah upozorava vas u sebe i Allah je da [svoje] sluge."

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "If you should love Allah, then follow me, [so] Allah will love you and forgive you your sins. And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful."
trans-unit.target: Reci, [O Muhammad], "Ako ti treba da vole Alaha, i prati me, [tako] Allah će da te volim i da ti oprosti tvoje grehe. A Allah je Forgiving i milostiv."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Obey Allah and the Messenger." But if they turn away - then indeed, Allah does not like the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Reci, "Pokoriti Alaha i glasnik." Ali, ako se okrenu - tada zaista, Allah ne voli skeptike.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah chose Adam and Noah and the family of Abraham and the family of 'Imran over the worlds -
trans-unit.target: Uistinu, Allah je odabrao Adam i Noa i porodice Abrahamov i porodice ' Imran preko svetova -

trans-unit.source: Descendants, some of them from others. And Allah is Hearing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Potomci, neki su od drugih. A Allah je sluh i znajuжi.

trans-unit.source: [Mention, O Muhammad], when the wife of 'Imran said, "My Lord, indeed I have pledged to You what is in my womb, consecrated [for Your service], so accept this from me. Indeed, You are the Hearing, the Knowing."
trans-unit.target: [Spomenuo, O Muhammad], kada supruga ' Imran je rekao, "moj gospodaru, zaista sam obećala je da će ti šta je u mojoj utrobi, osvećena [na usluzi], tako prihvatiti ovo od mene. Zaista, ti si sluh, na znajuжi."

trans-unit.source: But when she delivered her, she said, "My Lord, I have delivered a female." And Allah was most knowing of what she delivered, "And the male is not like the female. And I have named her Mary, and I seek refuge for her in You and [for] her descendants from Satan, the expelled [from the mercy of Allah]."
trans-unit.target: Ali kad joj je predao, rekla je: "moj gospodaru, sam puno dobroga ženku." Alah je većina jer znam šta je raznosila "i mužjak nije kao ženka. Nazvao sam joj Mary i trazim utociste za nju u sebi, kao i za njene potomke od Satane, proteranih [iz milost Alahova]."

trans-unit.source: So her Lord accepted her with good acceptance and caused her to grow in a good manner and put her in the care of Zechariah. Every time Zechariah entered upon her in the prayer chamber, he found with her provision. He said, "O Mary, from where is this [coming] to you?" She said, "It is from Allah. Indeed, Allah provides for whom He wills without account."
trans-unit.target: Tako joj Lord ju je prihvatio sa dobro prihvatanje i izazvao da rastu na dobar način, i stavi je na staranje Zaharija. Svaki put kad se Zaharija upisane nad njom u komoru za molitvu, on se našao sa njene odredbe. On je rekao, "O Marija, iz gde je ova [dolazi] ti?" Rekla je, "To je od Alaha. Zaista, Allah pruža za koga je volja, bez računa."

trans-unit.source: At that, Zechariah called upon his Lord, saying, "My Lord, grant me from Yourself a good offspring. Indeed, You are the Hearer of supplication."
trans-unit.target: U tome, Zaharija je pozvao svog gospodara, koji je rekao, "moj gospodaru, podari mi od sebe dobro potomstvo. Zaista, ti si pravdati od molitvi."

trans-unit.source: So the angels called him while he was standing in prayer in the chamber, "Indeed, Allah gives you good tidings of John, confirming a word from Allah and [who will be] honorable, abstaining [from women], and a prophet from among the righteous."
trans-unit.target: Pa andjeli ga je pozvao dok je stajao u molitvi u komori, "zaista, Allah ti daje radosne Jovana, potvrđujući reč od Alaha i [koji će biti ispravno, nije se izjasnila [od žene], i prorok među pravedne."

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, how will I have a boy when I have reached old age and my wife is barren?" The angel said, "Such is Allah; He does what He wills."
trans-unit.target: On je rekao, "Moj gospodaru, kako će dobiti mali kada sam došla do starosti, a moja žena je neplodna?" Anđeo je rekao: "tako je Allah; On radi sta mu je volja."

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, make for me a sign." He Said, "Your sign is that you will not [be able to] speak to the people for three days except by gesture. And remember your Lord much and exalt [Him with praise] in the evening and the morning."
trans-unit.target: On je rekao, "Moj gospodaru, da mi znak." On rekao, "tvoj znak je da ti se neće [moći] narodu govoriti za tri dana, osim od strane gest. "I zapamti tvoj gospodar mnogo i uzdignemo [ga sa pohvalama] u večeri i jutra."

trans-unit.source: And [mention] when the angels said, "O Mary, indeed Allah has chosen you and purified you and chosen you above the women of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: [Spomenuo] kad anđeli su rekli, "O Marijo, zaista Allah je izabrala tebe i prosvetli i izabrala tebe iznad žene svetova.

trans-unit.source: O Mary, be devoutly obedient to your Lord and prostrate and bow with those who bow [in prayer]."
trans-unit.target: O, Mary, biti pobožno poslušna svom gospodaru i poklonite i pokloni se s onima koji se klanjaju [u molitvi]. "

trans-unit.source: That is from the news of the unseen which We reveal to you, [O Muhammad]. And you were not with them when they cast their pens as to which of them should be responsible for Mary. Nor were you with them when they disputed.
trans-unit.target: To je iz vest o vidljivim koja otkriva ti, [O Muhammad]. I nisi bila sa njima kada su bacili svoje olovke o tome koji od njih bi trebao biti odgovoran za Mary. Niti si bio s njima kad su sporne.

trans-unit.source: [And mention] when the angels said, "O Mary, indeed Allah gives you good tidings of a word from Him, whose name will be the Messiah, Jesus, the son of Mary - distinguished in this world and the Hereafter and among those brought near [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: [I spomenuo] kad anđeli su rekli, "O Marijo, zaista Allah ti daje radosne reči od njega, čije ime će biti Mesija, Isus, sin Marije - istaknuti u ovom svetu i nadalje, kao i među onima je dovela blizu [Allah].

trans-unit.source: He will speak to the people in the cradle and in maturity and will be of the righteous."
trans-unit.target: On će govoriti ljudima u kolevci, kao i u zrelost i biće pravednih."

trans-unit.source: She said, "My Lord, how will I have a child when no man has touched me?" [The angel] said, "Such is Allah; He creates what He wills. When He decrees a matter, He only says to it, 'Be,' and it is.
trans-unit.target: Ona je rekla, "Moj gospodaru, kako će dobiti dete kad niko me je dodirnuo?" [Angel] je rekao, "tako je Allah; On stvara šta on Willis. Kada on izdaje dekret pitanje, kaže on, 'Da', a to je.

trans-unit.source: And He will teach him writing and wisdom and the Torah and the Gospel
trans-unit.target: I on će ga predajem pisanje i mudrost i Toru i Gospel

trans-unit.source: And [make him] a messenger to the Children of Israel, [who will say], 'Indeed I have come to you with a sign from your Lord in that I design for you from clay [that which is] like the form of a bird, then I breathe into it and it becomes a bird by permission of Allah. And I cure the blind and the leper, and I give life to the dead - by permission of Allah. And I inform you of what you eat and what you store in your houses. Indeed in that is a sign for you, if you are believers.
trans-unit.target: Ga [da] glasnika da decu Izraela, [koji će da kažu,] ' zaista dolazim ti sa znakom iz svoga gospodara u da dizajniram za tebe od gline [koja je] kao obliku ptica, a onda sam udahnuti u to i postane ptica po dozvolu od Alaha. Ja izleиim slepe i gubavac i dam život mrtvima - uz dozvolu od Alaha. I ja vas obavestim o Šta jedete i šta skladištite u vaše kuće. Zaista u to je znak za vas, ako ste vi vernici.

trans-unit.source: And [I have come] confirming what was before me of the Torah and to make lawful for you some of what was forbidden to you. And I have come to you with a sign from your Lord, so fear Allah and obey me.
trans-unit.target: I [ja] Potvrđujući kako je pre mene od Tore i da krenu zakonitu ti neke od šta je bilo zabranjeno da ti. I dolazim da ti je sa znakom od tvog Gospoda, toliko se Allah i Poslušaj me.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. That is the straight path."
