trans-unit.target: Uistinu, Allah je moj gospodar i tvoj gospodar, pa mu se klanjaju. "To je pravim putem."

trans-unit.source: But when Jesus felt [persistence in] disbelief from them, he said, "Who are my supporters for [the cause of] Allah?" The disciples said, "We are supporters for Allah. We have believed in Allah and testify that we are Muslims [submitting to Him].
trans-unit.target: Ali kad je bilo Isusu neverovanje [upornost u] od njih, on je rekao, "Ko su pristalice za [uzrok] Allah?" Apostoli je rekao, "mi smo pristalice za Alaha. Nismo verovali Alaha i svedoči da smo Muslimani [podnošenje mu].

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, we have believed in what You revealed and have followed the messenger Jesus, so register us among the witnesses [to truth]."
trans-unit.target: Gospod, da verujemo u šta ste otkrili i pratio glasnik Isusa, tako da nas prijavim među svedocima [za istinom]. "

trans-unit.source: And the disbelievers planned, but Allah planned. And Allah is the best of planners.
trans-unit.target: Skeptike planirao, a Allah je planirao. A Allah je najbolji od planera.

trans-unit.source: [Mention] when Allah said, "O Jesus, indeed I will take you and raise you to Myself and purify you from those who disbelieve and make those who follow you [in submission to Allah alone] superior to those who disbelieve until the Day of Resurrection. Then to Me is your return, and I will judge between you concerning that in which you used to differ.
trans-unit.target: [Spomenuo] kada Allah je rekao: "O, Isuse, zaista sam će te i gore do sebe i te ocistim od onih koji je siguran da je lažna, i da oni koji prate te [u pokornosti Alahu sama] superior onima koji sumnjaš u sve do dana uskrsnuća. Onda mi je tvoj povratak, i da će suditi između vas koje se odnose na to u kom ste koristili da se razlikuju.

trans-unit.source: And as for those who disbelieved, I will punish them with a severe punishment in this world and the Hereafter, and they will have no helpers."
trans-unit.target: Što se tiče onih koji ne veruje, će ih kazniti sa ozbiljnim kazna u ovom svetu i nadalje i oni će imati nema pomagači."

trans-unit.source: But as for those who believed and did righteous deeds, He will give them in full their rewards, and Allah does not like the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: Ali što se tiče onih koji veruje i da li pravedan dela, dao bi ih u potpunosti svoje nagrade, a Allah ne voli počinioce.

trans-unit.source: This is what We recite to you, [O Muhammad], of [Our] verses and the precise [and wise] message.
trans-unit.target: Ovo je sta recitujemo tebi, [O Muhammad], [naše] stihova i precizan [i mudar] poruku.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the example of Jesus to Allah is like that of Adam. He created Him from dust; then He said to him, "Be," and he was.
trans-unit.target: Zaista, na primer Isusa da Allah je kao od Adama. Napravio ga je od prašine; Onda mu je rekao, "Da", i bio je.

trans-unit.source: The truth is from your Lord, so do not be among the doubters.
trans-unit.target: Istina je od tvog Gospoda, ne budite među suditi nije.

trans-unit.source: Then whoever argues with you about it after [this] knowledge has come to you - say, "Come, let us call our sons and your sons, our women and your women, ourselves and yourselves, then supplicate earnestly [together] and invoke the curse of Allah upon the liars [among us]."
trans-unit.target: Onda ko god tvrdi da s tobom o tome nakon što se [to] znanje došlo da ti - reci, "Hajde, pusti nas pozvati svoje sinove i tvoji sinovi, zenske i tvoje žene, sebe i sebe, a onda tvojos iskreno [zajedno] i prizivamo stetnosti Allah baci [među nama]."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this is the true narration. And there is no deity except Allah. And indeed, Allah is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Zaista, ovo je istina naraciju. I nema boћanstvo osim Alaha. I zaista, Allah je Exalted u moć, mudri.

trans-unit.source: But if they turn away, then indeed - Allah is Knowing of the corrupters.
trans-unit.target: Ali, ako se okrenu, tada zaista - Allah je znajuжi od u corrupters.

trans-unit.source: Say, "O People of the Scripture, come to a word that is equitable between us and you - that we will not worship except Allah and not associate anything with Him and not take one another as lords instead of Allah." But if they turn away, then say, "Bear witness that we are Muslims [submitting to Him]."
trans-unit.target: Rekao: "O ljudi iz Svetog pisma, dodji da reč koja je pravedna između nas i vas - da ćemo ne obozava osim Alaha i ne, pridružite mu ništa i ne Uzmi jedno drugo kao gospodari umesto Allah." Ali, ako se okrenu, zatim izgovorite "Svedoci smo Muslimani [podnošenje mu]."

trans-unit.source: O People of the Scripture, why do you argue about Abraham while the Torah and the Gospel were not revealed until after him? Then will you not reason?
trans-unit.target: O ljudima iz Svetog pisma, zašto raspravljate o Abrahamu dok Toru i Gospel nisu otkriveni do posle njega? Onda će ti nije razlog?

trans-unit.source: Here you are - those who have argued about that of which you have [some] knowledge, but why do you argue about that of which you have no knowledge? And Allah knows, while you know not.
trans-unit.target: Evo - oni koji su tvrdili o tome od kojih su neki] imate znanje, ali zašto ti se raspravljati o tome od kojih imate bez znanja? A Allah zna, dok vi ne znate.

trans-unit.source: Abraham was neither a Jew nor a Christian, but he was one inclining toward truth, a Muslim [submitting to Allah]. And he was not of the polytheists.
trans-unit.target: Abraham nije bio ni Jevrej ni hrišćanin, ali bio je jedan volja prema istini, Muslimana [podnošenje Alahu]. I on nije bio na polytheists.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the most worthy of Abraham among the people are those who followed him [in submission to Allah] and this prophet, and those who believe [in his message]. And Allah is the ally of the believers.
trans-unit.target: Zaista, najgori Abraham među ljudima su one koji su pratili njega [u pokornosti Alahu] i ovaj prorok i oni koji veruju da [u svojoj poruci]. A Allah je saveznik vernika.

trans-unit.source: A faction of the people of the Scripture wish they could mislead you. But they do not mislead except themselves, and they perceive [it] not.
trans-unit.target: Frakcija naroda iz Svetog pisma bar su mogli da te obmanem. Ali oni ne zavaravati, osim sebe, a oni [to] ne doživljavaju.

trans-unit.source: O People of the Scripture, why do you disbelieve in the verses of Allah while you witness [to their truth]?
trans-unit.target: O ljudima iz Svetog pisma, zašto ti sumnjaš u stihove Allaha dok ste prisustvovali [da njihova istina]?

trans-unit.source: O People of the Scripture, why do you confuse the truth with falsehood and conceal the truth while you know [it]?
trans-unit.target: O ljudima iz Svetog pisma, zaљto preterivanja sa neistina i sakriti istinu, dok vi znate za [to]?

trans-unit.source: And a faction of the People of the Scripture say [to each other], "Believe in that which was revealed to the believers at the beginning of the day and reject it at its end that perhaps they will abandon their religion,
trans-unit.target: A frakcija naroda iz Svetog pisma, recimo [međusobno], "verujem u ono što je otkriveno da vernici na početku dana i odbaci ga na njegovom kraju da možda oni neće napustiti svoju religiju,

trans-unit.source: And do not trust except those who follow your religion." Say, "Indeed, the [true] guidance is the guidance of Allah. [Do you fear] lest someone be given [knowledge] like you were given or that they would [thereby] argue with you before your Lord?" Say, "Indeed, [all] bounty is in the hand of Allah - He grants it to whom He wills. And Allah is all-Encompassing and Wise."
trans-unit.target: "I ne vjerujete osim za one koji prate tvoje vere." "Zaista, stručnim [istina] je smernice za Alaha. [Strepite] da ne bi neko dobije [znanje] kao ti je dato, ili da bi oni [Time] se raspravljam sa tobom pred tvoj gospodar? " Recimo, "zaista, [sve] nagrada je u ruci od Allah - on prima goste to kome je volja. A Allah je sveobuhvatajućeg i mudar."

trans-unit.source: He selects for His mercy whom He wills. And Allah is the possessor of great bounty.
trans-unit.target: On bira za njegovu milost, koga je volja. A Allah je imalac veliku nagradu.

trans-unit.source: And among the People of the Scripture is he who, if you entrust him with a great amount [of wealth], he will return it to you. And among them is he who, if you entrust him with a [single] silver coin, he will not return it to you unless you are constantly standing over him [demanding it]. That is because they say, "There is no blame upon us concerning the unlearned." And they speak untruth about Allah while they know [it].
trans-unit.target: I među ljudima pisma iz on koji se, ako si ga poverila veliku dozu [bogatstvo], on će ti vratiti. Da, a među njima je on koji se, ako si ga poverila [jedne] srebrni novčić, on se neće vratiti to tebi osim ako ste stalno stoji nad njim [traži]. To je zato što oni kažu, "Ne postoji bez krivice pred nama u vezi sa kako." I oni govore neistine o Allah, dok oni znaju [to].

trans-unit.source: But yes, whoever fulfills his commitment and fears Allah - then indeed, Allah loves those who fear Him.
trans-unit.target: Ali da, ko god ispunjava svoju posvećenost i strahovi Allah - onda zaista, Alah, voli one koji ga se boje.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who exchange the covenant of Allah and their [own] oaths for a small price will have no share in the Hereafter, and Allah will not speak to them or look at them on the Day of Resurrection, nor will He purify them; and they will have a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Zaista, oni koji razmenjuju Zavjet od Alaha i sopstvene [] zakletve, jer je mala cena koju će imati nikakav deo na drugom svetu, i Allah neće razgovarati s njima ili Pogledaj ih na dan uskrsnuća, niti će on očisti ih; i oni će imati bolna kazna.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, there is among them a party who alter the Scripture with their tongues so you may think it is from the Scripture, but it is not from the Scripture. And they say, "This is from Allah," but it is not from Allah. And they speak untruth about Allah while they know.
trans-unit.target: I zaista, među njima zabava je ko alter Svetog pisma sa njihovim jezicima, tako da možda mislite da je iz Svetog pisma, ali to nije iz Svetog pisma. I govore: "Ovo je od Alaha", ali to nije od Alaha. I oni govore neistine o Allah, dok oni znaju.

trans-unit.source: It is not for a human [prophet] that Allah should give him the Scripture and authority and prophethood and then he would say to the people, "Be servants to me rather than Allah," but [instead, he would say], "Be pious scholars of the Lord because of what you have taught of the Scripture and because of what you have studied."
trans-unit.target: To je ne za ljudsko [prorok] da Alah da ga spis i autoritet i prophethood, i onda bi rekao ljudima, "biti sluge da me radije nego Allah", ali [umesto toga, on bi rekao], "Biti pobožni naučnici od Boga zbog naučila si od Svetog pisma i šta studirate."

trans-unit.source: Nor could he order you to take the angels and prophets as lords. Would he order you to disbelief after you had been Muslims?
trans-unit.target: Niti mogu da je naredio da se anđeli i proroci kao gospodari. Bih je naredio da neverovanje nakon što ste bili Muslimani?

trans-unit.source: And [recall, O People of the Scripture], when Allah took the covenant of the prophets, [saying], "Whatever I give you of the Scripture and wisdom and then there comes to you a messenger confirming what is with you, you [must] believe in him and support him." [Allah] said, "Have you acknowledged and taken upon that My commitment?" They said, "We have acknowledged it." He said, "Then bear witness, and I am with you among the witnesses."
trans-unit.target: I [opoziv, O ljudima pisma iz], kada je Allah uzeo Zavjet proroka, [ukazujući], "Šta god da vam iz Svetog pisma i mudrost i onda je tu u pitanju te glasnik potvrđuje šta je sa tobom, [mora] da veruju u njega i da ga podržavaju." [Allah] je rekao, "priznao i odveden na to obavezujem?" Rekli su, "Priznali smo to." On je rekao, "onda su svedoci, a ja sam s tobom među svedocima."

trans-unit.source: And whoever turned away after that - they were the defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: I ko god se okrenula nakon toga - bili su prkosno neposlušno.

trans-unit.source: So is it other than the religion of Allah they desire, while to Him have submitted [all] those within the heavens and earth, willingly or by compulsion, and to Him they will be returned?
trans-unit.target: Pa to je osim religije Alaha, oni žele, dok mu se predalo je [sve] te u roku od neba i zemlje, dobrovoljno ili po prinuda, i da ga oni će biti vraćena?

trans-unit.source: Say, "We have believed in Allah and in what was revealed to us and what was revealed to Abraham, Ishmael, Isaac, Jacob, and the Descendants, and in what was given to Moses and Jesus and to the prophets from their Lord. We make no distinction between any of them, and we are Muslims [submitting] to Him."
trans-unit.target: Reci, "smo verovao u Alaha otkriveno kako nam i šta je otkriveno da Abraham, Ismail, Isak, Jakob i potomke, i u šta je dat da Moses i Isus i proroci iz svog gospodara. Mi ne pravimo razliku između svih njih, a mi smo Muslimani [podnošenje] sa njim."

trans-unit.source: And whoever desires other than Islam as religion - never will it be accepted from him, and he, in the Hereafter, will be among the losers.
trans-unit.target: Onaj ko drugi nego Islam kao religiju želja - nikad to primaju se od njega i on, na drugom svetu, biće među gubitnike.

trans-unit.source: How shall Allah guide a people who disbelieved after their belief and had witnessed that the Messenger is true and clear signs had come to them? And Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.
trans-unit.target: Kako Alah da vodi ljude koji ne veruje nakon njihova vera i video da je glasnik je istina i jasni znakovi došao do njih? I, Alah ne povede malverzacijama narod.

trans-unit.source: Those - their recompense will be that upon them is the curse of Allah and the angels and the people, all together,
trans-unit.target: One - njihove naknadu će biti da na njih je prokletstvo od Alaha i anđeli i ljudi, svi zajedno,

trans-unit.source: Abiding eternally therein. The punishment will not be lightened for them, nor will they be reprieved.
trans-unit.target: Postojanu večito u tome. Kazna ce biti razvedrio nije za njih, niti će oni biti reprieved.

trans-unit.source: Except for those who repent after that and correct themselves. For indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Osim za one koji se pokaje nakon toga i sami ispraviti. Jer zaista, Allah je Forgiving i milosrdna.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who reject the message after their belief and then increase in disbelief - never will their [claimed] repentance be accepted, and they are the ones astray.
trans-unit.target: Zaista, oni koji odbacuju poruke nakon njihova vera i povećajte u neverici - nikad njihove [tvrdio je kako su] pokajanje primaju se, i oni su ti na odmet.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who disbelieve and die while they are disbelievers - never would the [whole] capacity of the earth in gold be accepted from one of them if he would [seek to] ransom himself with it. For those there will be a painful punishment, and they will have no helpers.
trans-unit.target: Zaista, oni koji sumnjaš i umre dok su skeptike - nikad ne bi [sve] kapacitet zemlje u zlatu biti prihvaćen od jednog od njih ako on bi [pokušavaju da] otkupninu za sebe sa tim. Za one će biti bolna kazna, i oni će imati nema pomagači.

trans-unit.source: Never will you attain the good [reward] until you spend [in the way of Allah] from that which you love. And whatever you spend - indeed, Allah is Knowing of it.
trans-unit.target: Nikada će ti neće postići dobre [nagrada] dok ne provodiš [na Alahovom putu] od one koje volite. I šta god ti provesti - zaista, Allah je znati za to.

trans-unit.source: All food was lawful to the Children of Israel except what Israel had made unlawful to himself before the Torah was revealed. Say, [O Muhammad], "So bring the Torah and recite it, if you should be truthful."
trans-unit.target: Sva hrana bilo zakonito decu Izraelu osim šta Izrael napravio nezakonito da sebe pre Tora je otkrivena. Recimo, [O Muhammad], "Pa Donesite Tore i izgovaramo, da si bio iskren."

trans-unit.source: And whoever invents about Allah untruth after that - then those are [truly] the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: I ko god izmisli o Allah neistine nakon toga - onda to su [istinski] počinioce.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Allah has told the truth. So follow the religion of Abraham, inclining toward truth; and he was not of the polytheists."
trans-unit.target: Reci, "Allah je rekao istinu. Pratite religija Abrahamov, volja prema istini; a on nije bio od na polytheists."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the first House [of worship] established for mankind was that at Makkah - blessed and a guidance for the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Zaista, na prvi bogomolji [] uspostavljen za ljudski rod koji je bio u Makkah - blagoslovljen i kao vodič za svetova.

trans-unit.source: In it are clear signs [such as] the standing place of Abraham. And whoever enters it shall be safe. And [due] to Allah from the people is a pilgrimage to the House - for whoever is able to find thereto a way. But whoever disbelieves - then indeed, Allah is free from need of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: U njemu su jasni znakovi poput stoji mesto od Abrahama. I ko god uđe to biti sigurni. I [krajnji rok] da Allah od ljudi kojima je hodočašće u kuću - ko god da bude moći naći prednjeg način. Ali ko god disbelieves - onda zaista, Allah je slobodan od potrebe svetova.

trans-unit.source: Say, "O People of the Scripture, why do you disbelieve in the verses of Allah while Allah is Witness over what you do?"
trans-unit.target: Kažu, "O ljudima iz Svetog pisma, zašto ti sumnjaš u stihove Allaha dok Alah je svedok preko kako?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "O People of the Scripture, why do you avert from the way of Allah those who believe, seeking to make it [seem] deviant, while you are witnesses [to the truth]? And Allah is not unaware of what you do."
trans-unit.target: Rekao je, "O ljudima iz Svetog pisma, zašto ti sklonim od puta Allah onih koji veruju, da od njega napravi [izgleda] devijantne, dok ste svedoci [istina]? "I Allah nije svestan onoga sto radite."

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, if you obey a party of those who were given the Scripture, they would turn you back, after your belief, [to being] unbelievers.
trans-unit.target: O ti koji veruju, ako budete stranka onih koji su dobili pismo, oni bi da te vratimo, nakon tvoje verovanje, [da] nevernicima.

trans-unit.source: And how could you disbelieve while to you are being recited the verses of Allah and among you is His Messenger? And whoever holds firmly to Allah has [indeed] been guided to a straight path.
trans-unit.target: A kako bi ti sumnjaš u dok je da su je recitovao stihove Alaha i među te je njegovo Messenger? I ko god drži čvrsto Alah je [zaista] instrukcije da pravolinijsku putanju.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, fear Allah as He should be feared and do not die except as Muslims [in submission to Him].
trans-unit.target: O ti koji veruju, strah i Alah dok je trebalo da se boje i ne umiru osim kao Muslimani [u pokornosti njemu].

trans-unit.source: And hold firmly to the rope of Allah all together and do not become divided. And remember the favor of Allah upon you - when you were enemies and He brought your hearts together and you became, by His favor, brothers. And you were on the edge of a pit of the Fire, and He saved you from it. Thus does Allah make clear to you His verses that you may be guided.
trans-unit.target: I držite čvrsto za uže od Alaha svi zajedno i postati podeljena. I zapamti uslugu i Allah na vas - kada ste bili neprijatelji i on je okupio svoja srca i postao, uz njegovu volju, braća. Bio si na ivici jame vatre i on te je spasio iz nje. Prema tome da li Allah ti razjasniti njegovih stihova te može biti vođena.

trans-unit.source: And let there be [arising] from you a nation inviting to [all that is] good, enjoining what is right and forbidding what is wrong, and those will be the successful.
trans-unit.target: I neka tamo biti [nastalih] te narod poziva da [sve] dobar, enjoining pravu stvar i zabranjuju šta ne valja, a one su uspešni.

trans-unit.source: And do not be like the ones who became divided and differed after the clear proofs had come to them. And those will have a great punishment.
trans-unit.target: I ne budite kao oni koji su postali podeljena i razlikovao nakon što je jasan dokaz je da im se. I oni će imati veliku kaznu.

trans-unit.source: On the Day [some] faces will turn white and [some] faces will turn black. As for those whose faces turn black, [to them it will be said], "Did you disbelieve after your belief? Then taste the punishment for what you used to reject."
trans-unit.target: Na dan [neka] lica će postati bela i [neka] lica će pocrneti. Što se tiče onih čija lica postane crn, [da ih to će biti rekao], "da li si siguran da je lažna nakon tvoje verovanje? Onda ukus kazna za šta si koristio da odbace."

trans-unit.source: But as for those whose faces will turn white, [they will be] within the mercy of Allah. They will abide therein eternally.
trans-unit.target: Ali što se tiče onih čija lica će postati Bela, [budu] unutar milost Alahova. Oni će u tome večno da trpe.

trans-unit.source: These are the verses of Allah. We recite them to you, [O Muhammad], in truth; and Allah wants no injustice to the worlds.
trans-unit.target: To su stihovi od Alaha. Smo ih da vam recituje, [O Muhammad], u istini; i, Alah želi nema nepravde da svetova.

trans-unit.source: To Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And to Allah will [all] matters be returned.
trans-unit.target: Alah pripada šta god je na nebesima, i šta god je na zemlji. I, Alah će [sve] stvari biti vraćena.

trans-unit.source: You are the best nation produced [as an example] for mankind. You enjoin what is right and forbid what is wrong and believe in Allah. If only the People of the Scripture had believed, it would have been better for them. Among them are believers, but most of them are defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: Vi ste najbolji narod proizveo [kao primer] za ljudsku vrstu. Ti zabranim pravu stvar i zabranjuju šta nije u redu i veruje u Alaha. Kad bi samo imali verovao da ljudi iz Svetog pisma, bilo bi bolje za njih. Među njima su vernici, ali većina njih je prkosno neposlušno.

trans-unit.source: They will not harm you except for [some] annoyance. And if they fight you, they will show you their backs; then they will not be aided.
trans-unit.target: Oni će ti nauditi osim [some] neprijatnost. A ako ti se oni bore, oni će ti pokazati leđa; Onda će ne bude si pomogao.

trans-unit.source: They have been put under humiliation [by Allah] wherever they are overtaken, except for a covenant from Allah and a rope from the Muslims. And they have drawn upon themselves anger from Allah and have been put under destitution. That is because they disbelieved in the verses of Allah and killed the prophets without right. That is because they disobeyed and [habitually] transgressed.
trans-unit.target: Oni su stavljene pod poniženje [Alaha] gde god oni su pretekao, osim sporazum od Alaha, a konopac od Muslimani. I oni su nacrtali na sebe bes od Alaha i su stavljene pod beda. To je zato što oni ne veruje u stihove Alaha i ubili proroke bez prava. To je zato što su poslusala i [iz navike] odmetnuli.

trans-unit.source: They are not [all] the same; among the People of the Scripture is a community standing [in obedience], reciting the verses of Allah during periods of the night and prostrating [in prayer].
trans-unit.target: Oni nisu [svi] isti; među ljudima iz Svetog pisma je zajednica stoji [u pokornosti], recitovanje stihova Alaha tokom perioda od noći i prostrating [u molitvi].

trans-unit.source: They believe in Allah and the Last Day, and they enjoin what is right and forbid what is wrong and hasten to good deeds. And those are among the righteous.
trans-unit.target: Oni veruju u Allaha i poslednji dan i zabranim pravu stvar i zabranjuju šta nije u redu i ubrzati da dobra dela. A to su među pravedne.

trans-unit.source: And whatever good they do - never will it be removed from them. And Allah is Knowing of the righteous.
trans-unit.target: I Kakvo god dobro rade - nikad ne će to biti uklonjeni iz njih. A Allah je znajuжi pravednika.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who disbelieve - never will their wealth or their children avail them against Allah at all, and those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally.
trans-unit.target: Uistinu, onima koji je siguran da je lažna - nikada njihovo bogatstvo ili njihova deca je uzaludno ih Allah uopšte, a to su Kompanjoni vatre; Oni će u tome večno da trpe.

trans-unit.source: The example of what they spend in this worldly life is like that of a wind containing frost which strikes the harvest of a people who have wronged themselves and destroys it. And Allah has not wronged them, but they wrong themselves.
trans-unit.target: Primer kako su proveli u ovaj zemaljski život je kao od vetar koji sadrži frost koji napada žetva naroda koji sebe nanosila i uništava ga. Alah su ih povredili, a o čemu se radi sebe.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not take as intimates those other than yourselves, for they will not spare you [any] ruin. They wish you would have hardship. Hatred has already appeared from their mouths, and what their breasts conceal is greater. We have certainly made clear to you the signs, if you will use reason.
trans-unit.target: O koji veruju, ne preduzmete kao tako blizak onima osim sebe, jer su zabrinjavate [svakog] propast. Žele da bi muku. Mržnja je već su se pojavili iz njihovih usta, a njihove grudi i sakriti je veća. Svakako jasno smo izneli ti znakove, ako ćete koristiti razlog.

trans-unit.source: Here you are loving them but they are not loving you, while you believe in the Scripture - all of it. And when they meet you, they say, "We believe." But when they are alone, they bite their fingertips at you in rage. Say, "Die in your rage. Indeed, Allah is Knowing of that within the breasts."
trans-unit.target: Ovde ih volite, ali ne uživaju u tebe, dok ti veruje u Svetog pisma - sve to. I kad te upoznaju, kažu oni, "mi verujemo." Ali kada su oni sami, grizu su vrhove prstiju na tebe u besu. Reci, "umri u tvoj bes. Uistinu, Allah je znajuжi to unutar grudi."

trans-unit.source: If good touches you, it distresses them; but if harm strikes you, they rejoice at it. And if you are patient and fear Allah, their plot will not harm you at all. Indeed, Allah is encompassing of what they do.
trans-unit.target: Ako dobro dotakne, rastuћuje ih; Ali ako zlo udari, oni se raduju tome. A ako ste strpljivi i strah Alaha, njihov plan će ti nauditi uopšte. Uistinu, Allah je koja obuhvata o onome što čine.

trans-unit.source: And [remember] when you, [O Muhammad], left your family in the morning to post the believers at their stations for the battle [of Uhud] - and Allah is Hearing and Knowing -
trans-unit.target: I [zapamti] kada si, [O Muhammad], napustio porodicu ujutro za knjiženje vernicima u svojim stanicama za bitku [Uhud] - i Allah je sluh i znajuжi-

trans-unit.source: When two parties among you were about to lose courage, but Allah was their ally; and upon Allah the believers should rely.
trans-unit.target: Kada dva stranaka među si izgubio hrabrost, ali Allah je bio njihov saveznik; i vernici oslonite na Alaha.

trans-unit.source: And already had Allah given you victory at [the battle of] Badr while you were few in number. Then fear Allah; perhaps you will be grateful.
trans-unit.target: I već Allah vam dao pobedu u [bici kod] Badr dok ste bili par u broj. A onda strah Allah; Možda će ti biti zahvalan.

trans-unit.source: [Remember] when you said to the believers, "Is it not sufficient for you that your Lord should reinforce you with three thousand angels sent down?
trans-unit.target: Zapamti kad si rekao da vernici, "je li nisu dovoljni za to treba da ti tvoj gospodar pojačati sa tri hiljade anđeli poslao?

trans-unit.source: Yes, if you remain patient and conscious of Allah and the enemy come upon you [attacking] in rage, your Lord will reinforce you with five thousand angels having marks [of distinction]
trans-unit.target: Da, ako ti ostanu strpljivi i pri svesti od Alaha, a neprijatelj nabasao na napadate [] u besu, tvoj gospodar će pojačati te sa pet hiljada anđeli imaju tragove [razliku]

trans-unit.source: And Allah made it not except as [a sign of] good tidings for you and to reassure your hearts thereby. And victory is not except from Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise -
trans-unit.target: A Allah je ne osim kao [znak] dobre vesti za tebe i da umiri svoja srca i time. I pobeda nije osim od Alaha, Exalted u moć, mudri-

trans-unit.source: That He might cut down a section of the disbelievers or suppress them so that they turn back disappointed.
trans-unit.target: Da je on možda smanjiti deo skeptike ili ih potisnuti, tako da se okrenu nazad razočaran.

trans-unit.source: Not for you, [O Muhammad, but for Allah], is the decision whether He should [cut them down] or forgive them or punish them, for indeed, they are wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: Nije za tebe, [O Muhammad, ali za Alaha], je odluka da li on treba da [ih smanji] ili oprosti im ili kazniti, zaista, one su počinioce.

trans-unit.source: And to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. He forgives whom He wills and punishes whom He wills. And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: I, Alah pripada šta god je na nebesima, i šta god je na zemlji. On oprašta koju je volja, i kome je volja kaћnjava. A Allah je Forgiving i milosrdna.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not consume usury, doubled and multiplied, but fear Allah that you may be successful.
trans-unit.target: O ti koji veruju, ne troši, mreza, udvostručio i umnožili, ali strah Alahu da ti može biti uspešna.

trans-unit.source: And fear the Fire, which has been prepared for the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: I strah u požaru, koji je pripremljen za skeptike.

trans-unit.source: And obey Allah and the Messenger that you may obtain mercy.
trans-unit.target: I pokoravati Alaha i glasnika da može da dobije milost.

trans-unit.source: And hasten to forgiveness from your Lord and a garden as wide as the heavens and earth, prepared for the righteous
trans-unit.target: I ubrzati da oprost od svoga gospodara i љiroko kao nebesa i zemlja, pripremljen za pravedne i vrt

trans-unit.source: Who spend [in the cause of Allah] during ease and hardship and who restrain anger and who pardon the people - and Allah loves the doers of good;
trans-unit.target: Koji provode [u uzrok Allah] tokom lakoćom i teškoćama koji Obuzdaj bes ko oprosti ljudima - i i Alah, voli akciju od dobro;

trans-unit.source: And those who, when they commit an immorality or wrong themselves [by transgression], remember Allah and seek forgiveness for their sins - and who can forgive sins except Allah? - and [who] do not persist in what they have done while they know.
trans-unit.target: I oni koji, kada su se na nemoral ili ih nisu sami [do transgresiju] pamte Alaha i tražiti oprost za svoje grehe - i koji mogu da oprostim grehe osim Alaha? - a [koji] ne budite uporni šta su uradili dok oni znaju.

trans-unit.source: Those - their reward is forgiveness from their Lord and gardens beneath which rivers flow [in Paradise], wherein they will abide eternally; and excellent is the reward of the [righteous] workers.
trans-unit.target: One - njihova nagrada je oprost od njihova gospodara i vrtova ispod koje poteku [u raju], u kojima će oni trpe zauvek; i odličan je nagrada za [pravedni] radnici.

trans-unit.source: Similar situations [as yours] have passed on before you, so proceed throughout the earth and observe how was the end of those who denied.
trans-unit.target: Slične situacije [kao i tvoja] preminuo pred vama, pa nastaviti širom zemlje i posmatram kako je bio kraj onih koji je odbijen.

trans-unit.source: This [Qur'an] is a clear statement to [all] the people and a guidance and instruction for those conscious of Allah.
trans-unit.target: Ovaj Kuran je jasno da dam izjavu [] svi i na Vodič i uputstvo za tih svesne Alaha.

trans-unit.source: So do not weaken and do not grieve, and you will be superior if you are [true] believers.
trans-unit.target: Dakle ne slabi i ne tuguj, i da će biti superiorniji ako si istinite [] vernici.

trans-unit.source: If a wound should touch you - there has already touched the [opposing] people a wound similar to it. And these days [of varying conditions] We alternate among the people so that Allah may make evident those who believe and [may] take to Himself from among you martyrs - and Allah does not like the wrongdoers -
trans-unit.target: Ako rana da dira ti - tamo je već dotakao [suprotstavljene] narod sličan to rana. I ovih dana [promenljivim uslovima] ne menjamo među ljudima tako da Alah može učiniti očigledan onih koji veruju i da [mogu] uzeti za sebe neku od mučenici - a Allah ne voli počinioce-

trans-unit.source: And that Allah may purify the believers [through trials] and destroy the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: I da Alah može da očisti vernici [kroz iskusenja] i uništiti skeptike.

trans-unit.source: Or do you think that you will enter Paradise while Allah has not yet made evident those of you who fight in His cause and made evident those who are steadfast?
trans-unit.target: Ili misliš li da će uneti raj dok je Allah ima još nije napravila evidentan one koji se bore u njegovom cilju i očigledan onima koji su postojano?

trans-unit.source: And you had certainly wished for martyrdom before you encountered it, and you have [now] seen it [before you] while you were looking on.
trans-unit.target: I da si sigurno hteo za muиeniљtvo pre nego što ste se sreli, i to [sada] videli [pred vama] dok ste gledali.

trans-unit.source: Muhammad is not but a messenger. [Other] messengers have passed on before him. So if he was to die or be killed, would you turn back on your heels [to unbelief]? And he who turns back on his heels will never harm Allah at all; but Allah will reward the grateful.
trans-unit.target: Muhammad je ne samo glasnik. [Druge] glasnici su umrli pre njega. Tako da je on umre ili bude ubijen, okreni nazad na petama [se nevera]? I onaj koji se ne vraća na petama nikad, Povredice Allah uopšte; Ali, Allah će nagraditi zahvalne.

trans-unit.source: And it is not [possible] for one to die except by permission of Allah at a decree determined. And whoever desires the reward of this world - We will give him thereof; and whoever desires the reward of the Hereafter - We will give him thereof. And we will reward the grateful.
trans-unit.target: I to nije [mogućim] za nekoga da umre osim uz dozvolu od Alaha u dekret određuje. I ko god želi nagradu ovog sveta - mi ćemo mu dati i ko god želi nagradu za nadalje - mi ćemo mu dati iste. I nas će nagraditi zahvalne.

trans-unit.source: And how many a prophet [fought and] with him fought many religious scholars. But they never lost assurance due to what afflicted them in the cause of Allah, nor did they weaken or submit. And Allah loves the steadfast.
trans-unit.target: I koliko prorok [su se borili i] sa njim borio se mnogi teolozi. Ali oni nikad nisam izgubio garanciju zbog šta ih je pogodio u uzrok Alaha, niti da li su oslabiti ili prosledite. I, Alah, voli je postojano.

trans-unit.source: And their words were not but that they said, "Our Lord, forgive us our sins and the excess [committed] in our affairs and plant firmly our feet and give us victory over the disbelieving people."
trans-unit.target: I njihove reči nisu bile, ali da su: "Gospod, oprosti nam naše grehe i ostatke [počinio] u nam poslove i podmetne čvrsto noge i daj nam pobedu nad disbelieving narod."

trans-unit.source: So Allah gave them the reward of this world and the good reward of the Hereafter. And Allah loves the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Tako Allah ih je dao nagradu ovog sveta i dobra nagrada za nadalje. I, Alah, voli akciju toga dobrog.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, if you obey those who disbelieve, they will turn you back on your heels, and you will [then] become losers.
trans-unit.target: O ti koji veruju, ako budete onima koji je siguran da je lažna, oni će te ponovo uključite petama, a ti [tadašnji] će postati gubitnici.

trans-unit.source: But Allah is your protector, and He is the best of helpers.
trans-unit.target: Ali Allah je tvoj zaštitnik, a on je najbolji od pomagaиa.

trans-unit.source: We will cast terror into the hearts of those who disbelieve for what they have associated with Allah of which He had not sent down [any] authority. And their refuge will be the Fire, and wretched is the residence of the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: Će dati teror u srcima onih koji je siguran da je lažna za šta su u vezi sa Allah, od kojih je nisi poslao niz [svakog] autoritet. I svoje utočište biće vatra, a jadna je rezidencija počinioce.

trans-unit.source: And Allah had certainly fulfilled His promise to you when you were killing the enemy by His permission until [the time] when you lost courage and fell to disputing about the order [given by the Prophet] and disobeyed after He had shown you that which you love. Among you are some who desire this world, and among you are some who desire the Hereafter. Then he turned you back from them [defeated] that He might test you. And He has already forgiven you, and Allah is the possessor of bounty for the believers.
trans-unit.target: A Allah sigurno ispunila svoje obećanje da će ti kad ubijao si neprijatelja do njegove dozvole do [Vrijeme] kada si izgubio hrabrost i pao da osporava o nalogu [Data od strane proroka] i poslusala nakon što je pokazao si ono što voliš. Među te su neki koji želja ovog sveta, a medju vama želja nekih koji na drugom svetu. Onda se pretvorio si nazad od njih [porazio] da on može da te testiram. I da ti je već oprostio, a Allah je imalac nagradaza vernici.

trans-unit.source: [Remember] when you [fled and] climbed [the mountain] without looking aside at anyone while the Messenger was calling you from behind. So Allah repaid you with distress upon distress so you would not grieve for that which had escaped you [of victory and spoils of war] or [for] that which had befallen you [of injury and death]. And Allah is [fully] Acquainted with what you do.
trans-unit.target: [Zapamtite] kada si [pobegli i] se popeo na planinu bez gledanja u stranu u nikoga dok vas glasnik nazvao otpozadi. Tako Allah vam vratili sa stresom na poziv tako da bi ti ne tuguj za ono što je promaklo ti [od pobede i ratni plen] ili [za] ono što je zadesilo ti [od povreda i smrti]. I, Alah [potpuno] je da se upozna sa onim što radite.

trans-unit.source: Then after distress, He sent down upon you security [in the form of] drowsiness, overcoming a faction of you, while another faction worried about themselves, thinking of Allah other than the truth - the thought of ignorance, saying, "Is there anything for us [to have done] in this matter?" Say, "Indeed, the matter belongs completely to Allah." They conceal within themselves what they will not reveal to you. They say, "If there was anything we could have done in the matter, some of us would not have been killed right here." Say, "Even if you had been inside your houses, those decreed to be killed would have come out to their death beds." [It was] so that Allah might test what is in your breasts and purify what is in your hearts. And Allah is Knowing of that within the breasts.
trans-unit.target: Onda nakon uznemirenost, poslao je na sigurnost [u obliku]: pospanost, prevazilaženje frakcija, dok neka druga frakcija je zabrinut za sebe, mislim na Alaha osim istinu - pomisao na neznanju, izreka, "je sve za nas [da] u ovoj stvari?" Kažu, "Zaista, stvar pripada potpuno Alaha." Šta će ne otkriju da si kriju u sebi samima. Rekli su, "Ako nije bilo ništa salama, u stvari, neki od nas bi nisu ubijeni ovde." Recimo, "čak i ako si ti bila unutar vaše kuće, one odredio da bude ubijen bi isplivala na krevetima smrt." [Je] kako bi Allah mogao da testirate koji je u tvoje grudi i očisti šta je u srcima. A Allah je znajuжi to unutar dojke.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those of you who turned back on the day the two armies met, it was Satan who caused them to slip because of some [blame] they had earned. But Allah has already forgiven them. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Forbearing.
trans-unit.target: Zaista, oni koji smo se vratili na dan dve armije sreli, da je Satana, koji je izazvao ih da klizi zbog pomalo krivi su imali zaradili. Ali, Allah je već oprostio ih. Uistinu, Allah je Forgiving i Forbearing.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not be like those who disbelieved and said about their brothers when they traveled through the land or went out to fight, "If they had been with us, they would not have died or have been killed," so Allah makes that [misconception] a regret within their hearts. And it is Allah who gives life and causes death, and Allah is Seeing of what you do.
trans-unit.target: O ti koji veruju, ne budite kao oni koji ne veruje i govorili o njihova braća, kada je putovao po zemlji ili da se bore, "Da su bili sa nama, oni ne bi umrla ili su ubijeni", Dakle Allah pravi ta zabluda žaljenje u srcima. To je Alah koji daje život i izaziva smrt i Alah vidi što vi radite.

trans-unit.source: And if you are killed in the cause of Allah or die - then forgiveness from Allah and mercy are better than whatever they accumulate [in this world].
trans-unit.target: A ako te ubiju u uzrok Alah ili umri - oprost od Alaha i milost su bolje nego šta god oni akumuliraju [na svijetu].

trans-unit.source: And whether you die or are killed, unto Allah you will be gathered.
trans-unit.target: I da li umru ili budu ubijeni, k Alah ti biti prikupljene.

trans-unit.source: So by mercy from Allah, [O Muhammad], you were lenient with them. And if you had been rude [in speech] and harsh in heart, they would have disbanded from about you. So pardon them and ask forgiveness for them and consult them in the matter. And when you have decided, then rely upon Allah. Indeed, Allah loves those who rely [upon Him].
trans-unit.target: Po milosti od Alaha, [O Muhammad], bio si blag s njima. I da si bio bezobrazan [u govor] i grubo u srcu, oni bi imati raspušten iz o tebi. Tako ih pomiluje i pitao oprost za njih i pitaj ih po ovom pitanju. I kada ste odlučili, onda da se oslonimo na Alaha. Zaista, Alah, voli one koji se oslanjaju [on].

trans-unit.source: If Allah should aid you, no one can overcome you; but if He should forsake you, who is there that can aid you after Him? And upon Allah let the believers rely.
trans-unit.target: Ako Alah treba da da vam pomognem, niko ne moze da prevazidje te; Ali ako on bi trebalo da te napustiti, ko je tamo, to mogu da ti pomognem za njim? I na Alaha da vernici se osloniti.

trans-unit.source: It is not [attributable] to any prophet that he would act unfaithfully [in regard to war booty]. And whoever betrays, [taking unlawfully], will come with what he took on the Day of Resurrection. Then will every soul be [fully] compensated for what it earned, and they will not be wronged.
trans-unit.target: To nije [pripisati] svaki prorok koji je, ako se ponasate unfaithfully [kada je u pitanju ratni plen]. I ko god me izdala [uzimajući nezakonito], idu sa šta je uzeo na dan uskrsnuća. Zatim će svaka duša [u potpunosti] kompenzaciju za šta to zaradio, i oni će biti prevarena.

trans-unit.source: So is one who pursues the pleasure of Allah like one who brings upon himself the anger of Allah and whose refuge is Hell? And wretched is the destination.
trans-unit.target: Tako je onaj koji teži zadovoljavanju Allah kao onaj koji donosi na sebe bes Alaha i čije utočište je pakao? A jadni odredište.

trans-unit.source: They are [varying] degrees in the sight of Allah, and Allah is Seeing of whatever they do.
trans-unit.target: Oni su [] razine u ime Alaha i Alah vidi u šta god oni rade.

trans-unit.source: Certainly did Allah confer [great] favor upon the believers when He sent among them a Messenger from themselves, reciting to them His verses and purifying them and teaching them the Book and wisdom, although they had been before in manifest error.
trans-unit.target: Svakako da li Allah se konsultujem [veliki] uslugu na vernici kada je poslao među njima glasnik od njih samih, recitovanje im njegovih stihova i preиiљжavanje ih i uče ga knjizi i mudrosti, mada su bili ranije u manifesta.

trans-unit.source: Why [is it that] when a [single] disaster struck you [on the day of Uhud], although you had struck [the enemy in the battle of Badr] with one twice as great, you said, "From where is this?" Say, "It is from yourselves." Indeed, Allah is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: Zašto [je to] kada, [jednoj] katastrofa je ti [na dan Uhud], iako te postigla [neprijatelja u bici na Badr] sa jednom dva puta kao veliki, rekao si, "od gde je ovo?" Reci, "To je od vas samih." Uistinu, Allah je preko nadležnih sve stvari.

trans-unit.source: And what struck you on the day the two armies met was by permission of Allah that He might make evident the [true] believers.
trans-unit.target: A šta ti je udario na dan kada su se dve vojske sastale uz dozvolu od Alaha da on može da evidentno [istina] vernici.

trans-unit.source: And that He might make evident those who are hypocrites. For it was said to them, "Come, fight in the way of Allah or [at least] defend." They said, "If we had known [there would be] fighting, we would have followed you." They were nearer to disbelief that day than to faith, saying with their mouths what was not in their hearts. And Allah is most Knowing of what they conceal -
trans-unit.target: I da bi napravio očigledan onima koji su dvolicni. Zbog toga je rekao im, "Hajde, se bori na Alahovom putu ili [bar] brani." Rekli su: "da smo znali [postoji] borbe, mi bi pratili tebe." Oni su bili bliskiji neverovanje tog dana od vere, govori svojim ustima šta nije bilo u njihovim srcima. A Allah je većina znajuжi od Šta kriju-

trans-unit.source: Those who said about their brothers while sitting [at home], "If they had obeyed us, they would not have been killed." Say, "Then prevent death from yourselves, if you should be truthful."
trans-unit.target: Oni koji su rekli o njihova braća dok ste stajali [kuci], "Ako su Pokorili su nas, oni bi nisu ubijeni." Reci, "a onda sprečavanje smrti od vas samih, da si bio iskren.

trans-unit.source: And never think of those who have been killed in the cause of Allah as dead. Rather, they are alive with their Lord, receiving provision,
trans-unit.target: I nikad ne misli na one koji su poginuli u uzrok Allah kao mrtvi. Naime, radi se od svog gospodara, primanje odredba,

trans-unit.source: Rejoicing in what Allah has bestowed upon them of His bounty, and they receive good tidings about those [to be martyred] after them who have not yet joined them - that there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve.
trans-unit.target: Radosni u kakav Allah darovao ih od njegove nagrade, i primaju dobre vesti o onima [da umoren] za njima, koji se još nisu pridružile ih - da će postojati bez straha u vezi sa njima, niti će oni tugovati.

trans-unit.source: They receive good tidings of favor from Allah and bounty and [of the fact] that Allah does not allow the reward of believers to be lost -
trans-unit.target: Oni primaju radosne od usluga od Alaha i na glave i [o tome] da Alah ne dozvoljava nagradu za vernike da je izgubljen -

trans-unit.source: Those [believers] who responded to Allah and the Messenger after injury had struck them. For those who did good among them and feared Allah is a great reward -
trans-unit.target: Oni [vernici] ko je odgovorio na Alaha i glasnik nakon povrede da ih je pogodio. Za one koji su uradili dobar među njima i se boje Allah je velika nagrada-

trans-unit.source: Those to whom hypocrites said, "Indeed, the people have gathered against you, so fear them." But it [merely] increased them in faith, and they said, "Sufficient for us is Allah, and [He is] the best Disposer of affairs."
trans-unit.target: Onima kojima licemeri je rekao, "zaista, ljudi su se okupili protiv tebe, pa bojim ih se." Ali to ih [samo] povećao se u veri, i rekli su, "Sufficient nam je Allah, i [je] najbolje Disposer poslova."

trans-unit.source: So they returned with favor from Allah and bounty, no harm having touched them. And they pursued the pleasure of Allah, and Allah is the possessor of great bounty.
trans-unit.target: Tako su se vratili sa uslugu od Alaha i nagrada, nikakvo zlo ih dodirnuli. Jurili su zadovoljstvo Allaha i Allah je imalac veliku nagradu.

trans-unit.source: That is only Satan who frightens [you] of his supporters. So fear them not, but fear Me, if you are [indeed] believers.
trans-unit.target: To jest jedini Sotona koji se bojite [] njegove pristalice. Tako ih ne boj se, ali Me se bojiš, ako ste [zaista] vernici.

trans-unit.source: And do not be grieved, [O Muhammad], by those who hasten into disbelief. Indeed, they will never harm Allah at all. Allah intends that He should give them no share in the Hereafter, and for them is a great punishment.
trans-unit.target: I ne budi u bolu, [O Muhammad], zbog onih koji ubrzati u neverici. Zaista, nikada nisam Naudit će Allah uopšte. Alah namerava da da ih nema udeo na drugom svetu, i za njih je velika kazna.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who purchase disbelief [in exchange] for faith - never will they harm Allah at all, and for them is a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Uistinu, one koji neverovanje [zauzvrat] za veru - nikad neće uopšte Naudit Alaha, i za njih je bolna kazna.

trans-unit.source: And let not those who disbelieve ever think that [because] We extend their time [of enjoyment] it is better for them. We only extend it for them so that they may increase in sin, and for them is a humiliating punishment.
trans-unit.target: I neka ne oni koji je ikada sumnjaš da [jer] da proširimo svoje doba [uživanja] bilo bi bolje za njih. Samo smo to proširiti za njih tako da može da se poveća u grehu, i za njih je ponižavajuće kazna.

trans-unit.source: Allah would not leave the believers in that [state] you are in [presently] until He separates the evil from the good. Nor would Allah reveal to you the unseen. But [instead], Allah chooses of His messengers whom He wills, so believe in Allah and His messengers. And if you believe and fear Him, then for you is a great reward.
trans-unit.target: Alah ne bi napustila vernicima u tom stanju nalazite [trenutno] dok se on odvaja zlo od dobra. Niti bi Allah da ti otkrijem nevidjeno. Ali [umesto toga], Allah bira svog kurira koga on wills, pa verujem u Alaha i njegove glasnike. Ako i ti verovati boje njega, onda za tebe je velika nagrada.

trans-unit.source: And let not those who [greedily] withhold what Allah has given them of His bounty ever think that it is better for them. Rather, it is worse for them. Their necks will be encircled by what they withheld on the Day of Resurrection. And to Allah belongs the heritage of the heavens and the earth. And Allah, with what you do, is [fully] Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: I neka ne oni koji [gramzivo] uskrati kakav Alah je dao od njegove nagrade ikada mislim da je to bolje za njih. Radije, to je gore za njih. Će biti okruzen njihovih vratova šta su prikrili na dan uskrsnuća. I, Alah pripada baštine neba i zemlje. I, Alah, sa onim što radite, je [u potpunosti] upoznata.

trans-unit.source: Allah has certainly heard the statement of those [Jews] who said, "Indeed, Allah is poor, while we are rich." We will record what they said and their killing of the prophets without right and will say, "Taste the punishment of the Burning Fire.
trans-unit.target: Alah je sigurno čuo izjavu od onih Jevreja ko je rekao: "Zaista, Allah je jadni, dok smo bogati." Smo će zapisati, to su rekli i njihova ubijanja proroka bez prava i reći "okusi kazna Burning vatre.

trans-unit.source: That is for what your hands have put forth and because Allah is not ever unjust to [His] servants."
trans-unit.target: To je za šta je ruke izneli i zato što je Alah nije nikad nepravedan prema [svoje] sluge. "

trans-unit.source: [They are] those who said, "Indeed, Allah has taken our promise not to believe any messenger until he brings us an offering which fire [from heaven] will consume." Say, "There have already come to you messengers before me with clear proofs and [even] that of which you speak. So why did you kill them, if you should be truthful?"
trans-unit.target: [To su] onima koji je rekao: "Zaista, Allah je uzeo nam obećanje da ne verujete li glasnik dok nam on donosi dar koji vatru [nebesa] zauzeće." Reci, "tamo vec dosli na glasnike pre mene sa jasne dokaze i [čak i] to o kojoj govorite. Zašto ti si ubio njih, da si bio iskren?"

trans-unit.source: Then if they deny you, [O Muhammad] - so were messengers denied before you, who brought clear proofs and written ordinances and the enlightening Scripture.
trans-unit.target: Onda ako poreknu te, [O Muhammad] - tako su glasnici odbijena pred vama, koji ste jasne dokaze i pisane uredbe i prosvetljujuжe pismo.

trans-unit.source: Every soul will taste death, and you will only be given your [full] compensation on the Day of Resurrection. So he who is drawn away from the Fire and admitted to Paradise has attained [his desire]. And what is the life of this world except the enjoyment of delusion.
trans-unit.target: Svaka duša će okusiti smrt, a samo Dobicete [potpuno] kompenzacija na dan uskrsnuća. Pa ko je nacrtao se od vatre i priznao da je raj ima poluljudi njegovu želju. I šta je život ovog sveta osim uživanja zablude.

trans-unit.source: You will surely be tested in your possessions and in yourselves. And you will surely hear from those who were given the Scripture before you and from those who associate others with Allah much abuse. But if you are patient and fear Allah - indeed, that is of the matters [worthy] of determination.
trans-unit.target: Sigurno biti testiran u tvoju imovinu i u sebe. I sigurno čućete od onih koji su dobili pismo pred vama, kao i od onih koji su ostali pridružite Allah toliko zlostavljanja. Ali ako ste strpljivi i boj se Allah - zaista, to je poslove [dostojni] determinacije.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Allah took a covenant from those who were given the Scripture, [saying], "You must make it clear to the people and not conceal it." But they threw it away behind their backs and exchanged it for a small price. And wretched is that which they purchased.
trans-unit.target: I [pomena, O Muhammad], kad Allah je pogodba od onih koji su dobili pismo, [ukazujući], "morate jasno da ljudi i ne skriva to." Ali, oni je bacio iza leđa i da ga je trampio za mala cena. I jadni su one koje su kupili.

trans-unit.source: And never think that those who rejoice in what they have perpetrated and like to be praised for what they did not do - never think them [to be] in safety from the punishment, and for them is a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: I nikad ne misli da oni koji se raduju u šta imaju počinjeno i kao da budu slavljeni šta su uradili ne - nikada ne misli da ih [da] u sigurnosti od kazne, a za njih je bolna kazna.

trans-unit.source: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth, and Allah is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: Alah pripada vlast nebesa i zemlje i Allah je preko nadležnih sve stvari.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, in the creation of the heavens and the earth and the alternation of the night and the day are signs for those of understanding.
trans-unit.target: Zaista, u stvaranju nebesa i zemlju i zamena noći i dana su znaci za one o razumevanju.

trans-unit.source: Who remember Allah while standing or sitting or [lying] on their sides and give thought to the creation of the heavens and the earth, [saying], "Our Lord, You did not create this aimlessly; exalted are You [above such a thing]; then protect us from the punishment of the Fire.
trans-unit.target: Ko zapamti Allah dok stoji ili sedi ili [laganje] sa njihove strane i dati misao za stvaranje nebesa i zemlju, [ukazujući], "Gospod, niste kreirali ovo besciljno; uzviљenom Jesi li [iznad takve stvari]; Onda, zaštiti nas od kazne vatre.

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, indeed whoever You admit to the Fire - You have disgraced him, and for the wrongdoers there are no helpers.
trans-unit.target: Gospod, zaista ko god priznajete da je vatra - osramotili ste ga, a za počinioce ne postoje ni pomagači.

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, indeed we have heard a caller calling to faith, [saying], 'Believe in your Lord,' and we have believed. Our Lord, so forgive us our sins and remove from us our misdeeds and cause us to die with the righteous.
trans-unit.target: Gospod, zaista smo čuli poziv zove vere, [ukazujući], 'Verujem u tvoj gospodar,' i verovali smo. Gospod, tako, oprosti nam naše grehe i ukloniti iz nas nam nedela i uzrokuju da umremo sa pravednima.

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, and grant us what You promised us through Your messengers and do not disgrace us on the Day of Resurrection. Indeed, You do not fail in [Your] promise."
trans-unit.target: Gospod, i podari nam obecali nas kroz svoje glasnike i ne sramotite nas na dan uskrsnuća. Zaista, ti ne iznevjerimo u [] obecanje."

trans-unit.source: And their Lord responded to them, "Never will I allow to be lost the work of [any] worker among you, whether male or female; you are of one another. So those who emigrated or were evicted from their homes or were harmed in My cause or fought or were killed - I will surely remove from them their misdeeds, and I will surely admit them to gardens beneath which rivers flow as reward from Allah, and Allah has with Him the best reward."
trans-unit.target: I njihov gospodar je odgovorio na njih, "nikad dopustiti izgubiti posao [svakog] radnika medju vama, da li je muški ili ženski; Ti si jedan od drugoga. Tako oni koji su emigrirali ili su iseljeni iz svojih domova ili povredi u moju borbu ili su se borili, ili su bili ubio - ja će sigurno ukloniti iz njih svojim nedelima, i ja sigurno ne priznaju ih vrtova ispod koje poteku kao nagradu od Alaha i Alah sa njim su nagrada za najbolji. "

trans-unit.source: Be not deceived by the [uninhibited] movement of the disbelievers throughout the land.
trans-unit.target: Da nije vas zavede [slobodna] kretanja skeptike po celoj zemlji.

trans-unit.source: [It is but] a small enjoyment; then their [final] refuge is Hell, and wretched is the resting place.
trans-unit.target: [To je ali] mali uživanje; Onda je njihov [konačni] utočište je pakao, a jadna je mijesto gde.

trans-unit.source: But those who feared their Lord will have gardens beneath which rivers flow, abiding eternally therein, as accommodation from Allah. And that which is with Allah is best for the righteous.
trans-unit.target: Ali onima koji se boje svog gospodara imaće vrtova ispod koje poteku, postojanu beskrajno izneseno kao smeštaj od Alaha. I to što je Alah je najbolji za pravedne.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, among the People of the Scripture are those who believe in Allah and what was revealed to you and what was revealed to them, [being] humbly submissive to Allah. They do not exchange the verses of Allah for a small price. Those will have their reward with their Lord. Indeed, Allah is swift in account.
trans-unit.target: I zaista, među ljudima iz Svetog pisma su verovali u Allaha i šta ti je bilo otkriveno i šta je otkriveno da ih, [postane] ponizno pokoran Alahu. Oni ne razmene stihove Alaha za mala cena. One biti nagrađeni sa svog gospodara. Uistinu, Allah je brz u nalog.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, persevere and endure and remain stationed and fear Allah that you may be successful.
trans-unit.target: O ti koji veruju, istrajati i trpimo i ostaju stacionirane i bojim se Alahu da ti može biti uspešna.

trans-unit.source: O mankind, fear your Lord, who created you from one soul and created from it its mate and dispersed from both of them many men and women. And fear Allah, through whom you ask one another, and the wombs. Indeed Allah is ever, over you, an Observer.
trans-unit.target: O ljudski rod, bojim se tvog Gospoda, koji te stvorila od jedne dušu i kreiranu kreste i udaljene od obe mnogih muškaraca i žena. I strah Alaha, kroz koga pozvati jedno drugom, i utrobe. Zaista Allah je ikada, nad tobom, posmatrač.

trans-unit.source: And give to the orphans their properties and do not substitute the defective [of your own] for the good [of theirs]. And do not consume their properties into your own. Indeed, that is ever a great sin.
trans-unit.target: I dati Orphansi njihova svojstva, a ne za zamenu neispravnom [svojih] za dobrobit [njihov]. I nije potrošena njihova svojstva u tvoju glavu. Zaista, to je veliki greh.

trans-unit.source: And if you fear that you will not deal justly with the orphan girls, then marry those that please you of [other] women, two or three or four. But if you fear that you will not be just, then [marry only] one or those your right hand possesses. That is more suitable that you may not incline [to injustice].
trans-unit.target: I ako te strah da ti neće baviti pravedno siročići devojke, onda se Udaj za one koje ti [druge] žene, dva ili tri ili cetiri. Ali ako te strah da te će ne samo biti, tada [venčati samo jednu ili one poseduje je desnom rukom. To je pogodnije da ti možda ne naginje [nepravde].

trans-unit.source: And give the women [upon marriage] their [bridal] gifts graciously. But if they give up willingly to you anything of it, then take it in satisfaction and ease.
trans-unit.target: I dajte ženama [na brak] [svadbeni] poklone ljubazno. Ali ako su dobrovoljno vam dati ništa od toga, onda uzmi zadovoljstva i lakoće.

trans-unit.source: And do not give the weak-minded your property, which Allah has made a means of sustenance for you, but provide for them with it and clothe them and speak to them words of appropriate kindness.
trans-unit.target: I ne daj maloumne tvoju imovinu, koja je Allah je uložila sredstva za egzistenciju za tebe, ali im pružiti i poniћavamo i razgovaram sa njima reči odgovarajuće dobrote.

trans-unit.source: And test the orphans [in their abilities] until they reach marriageable age. Then if you perceive in them sound judgement, release their property to them. And do not consume it excessively and quickly, [anticipating] that they will grow up. And whoever, [when acting as guardian], is self-sufficient should refrain [from taking a fee]; and whoever is poor - let him take according to what is acceptable. Then when you release their property to them, bring witnesses upon them. And sufficient is Allah as Accountant.
trans-unit.target: I testirali siročadi [u njihove sposobnosti] dok ne stignu do udaje. Ako vi vidite u njima zvuci Sudnji, oslobodi svoju imovinu na njih. I ne troši ga jako i brzo, predviđanje da porastemo. I ko god, [kada se ponaša kao čuvar], je samodovoljan bi trebalo da se uzdrže [od naknadu]; i ko god da je jadni - i da ga prema onome što je prihvatljivo. Onda kada svoju imovinu da ih otpustite, dovedi svedoka nad njima. A dovoljan je Allah kao računovođa.

trans-unit.source: For men is a share of what the parents and close relatives leave, and for women is a share of what the parents and close relatives leave, be it little or much - an obligatory share.
trans-unit.target: Za ljude je deo koji roditelji i bliski rođaci odsustvo, a za žene je deo šta roditelji i bliski rođaci ostavi, bude to malo ili puno - je obavezni deo.

trans-unit.source: And when [other] relatives and orphans and the needy are present at the [time of] division, then provide for them [something] out of the estate and speak to them words of appropriate kindness.
trans-unit.target: I kada su prisutni mezimac [doba] [druge] rodbinu i siročad i u nevolji, onda navedite za njih [nešto] sa imanja i razgovaram sa njima reči odgovarajuće dobrote.

trans-unit.source: And let those [executors and guardians] fear [injustice] as if they [themselves] had left weak offspring behind and feared for them. So let them fear Allah and speak words of appropriate justice.
trans-unit.target: I neka oni [izvrљioce i čuvari] strah [nepravde] kao da su [sami] ostavili slaba potomstva i bojao se za njih. Neka strah Alaha i govorite odgovarajuće pravde.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who devour the property of orphans unjustly are only consuming into their bellies fire. And they will be burned in a Blaze.
trans-unit.target: Zaista, samo one koji nepravedno progutati vlasništvo siročadi konzumiraju u vatru svoje stomake. I oni će biti spaljen u plamenu.

trans-unit.source: Allah instructs you concerning your children: for the male, what is equal to the share of two females. But if there are [only] daughters, two or more, for them is two thirds of one's estate. And if there is only one, for her is half. And for one's parents, to each one of them is a sixth of his estate if he left children. But if he had no children and the parents [alone] inherit from him, then for his mother is one third. And if he had brothers [or sisters], for his mother is a sixth, after any bequest he [may have] made or debt. Your parents or your children - you know not which of them are nearest to you in benefit. [These shares are] an obligation [imposed] by Allah. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: Alah naloži koje se odnose na djecu: za mužjak, šta je jednak udeo dve ženke. Ali, ako postoje [samo] kćeri, dva ili više, za njih je dve trećine nečije imovine. I ako postoji samo jedan, za nju je pola. I za roditelje, da se jedan od njih je šestinu od njegove imovine ako je ostavio decu. Ali ako nije imao decu i roditelje [sami] nasleđuju od njega, onda za njegovu majku je jedna trećina. I da je imao brata [ili sestru], za njegovu majku je šesto, posle svakog legat on [možda] napravio ili dug. Tvoji roditelji ili tvoja deca - ti ne znam ko je od njih su udaljava u korist. [Ove akcije su] obavezu [nameću u ime Alaha. Uistinu, Allah je ikada znati i mudar.

trans-unit.source: And for you is half of what your wives leave if they have no child. But if they have a child, for you is one fourth of what they leave, after any bequest they [may have] made or debt. And for the wives is one fourth if you leave no child. But if you leave a child, then for them is an eighth of what you leave, after any bequest you [may have] made or debt. And if a man or woman leaves neither ascendants nor descendants but has a brother or a sister, then for each one of them is a sixth. But if they are more than two, they share a third, after any bequest which was made or debt, as long as there is no detriment [caused]. [This is] an ordinance from Allah, and Allah is Knowing and Forbearing.
trans-unit.target: I za tebe je polovina koja svoje supruge ostavi ako imaju dete. Ali ako imaju dete, za tebe je četvrtina šta ostavljaju, nakon svakog legat su [možda] napravio ili dug. I za žene je četvrtina ako ostavi nema dete. Ali ako ostavite dete, onda im je za osminu šta ostavio, nakon svakog legat imate [može] napravio ili dug. I ako ženski ostavlja ni ascendants, ni potomci, ali ima brata ili sestru, onda za svaki od njih je љesto. Da, ali ako su više od dva, dele treći, nakon svakog legat koji je načinjen ili dug, dok god postoji nema štetu [uzrok]. [Ovo je] uredbu koja od Alaha, a Allah je znajuжi i Forbearing.

trans-unit.source: These are the limits [set by] Allah, and whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger will be admitted by Him to gardens [in Paradise] under which rivers flow, abiding eternally therein; and that is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: Ove su granice [postavljenih pomoću] Alaha, i onaj ko se pokorava Alaha, i njegovog glasnika će biti primljena od strane ga vrtova [u raju] pod kojim poteku, postojanu večito u tome; i to je super postizanju.

trans-unit.source: And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger and transgresses His limits - He will put him into the Fire to abide eternally therein, and he will have a humiliating punishment.
trans-unit.target: Onaj ko ne posluљa Alaha, i njegovog glasnika i transgresses svoje granice - će stavio ga je u vatru da se povinuju večito u tome i on će imati ponižavajuće kazna.

trans-unit.source: Those who commit unlawful sexual intercourse of your women - bring against them four [witnesses] from among you. And if they testify, confine the guilty women to houses until death takes them or Allah ordains for them [another] way.
trans-unit.target: Donesite koje poиine nezakonit seksualni odnos od tvoje žene - protiv njih 4 [svedoci] neku od vas. I ako su svedoči, onesposobljeni krivim žene u kuće dok smrt ih je potrebno ili Alah nalaћe za njih [druge] način.

trans-unit.source: And the two who commit it among you, dishonor them both. But if they repent and correct themselves, leave them alone. Indeed, Allah is ever Accepting of repentance and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: I ona dvojica koji su ga poиini medju vama, osramotimo ih oboje. Ali, ako se pokajem i ispravite sebe, ostavi ih na miru. Uistinu, Allah je ikada Accepting pokajanja i milosrdna.

trans-unit.source: The repentance accepted by Allah is only for those who do wrong in ignorance [or carelessness] and then repent soon after. It is those to whom Allah will turn in forgiveness, and Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: Kajanje je prihvatio u ime Alaha je samo za one koji loše u neznanju [ili nepažnjom] i onda se pokaje ubrzo nakon toga. Je onih kojima Allah će pretvoriti u oprost, a Allah je ikada znati i mudar.

trans-unit.source: But repentance is not [accepted] of those who [continue to] do evil deeds up until, when death comes to one of them, he says, "Indeed, I have repented now," or of those who die while they are disbelievers. For them We have prepared a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Ali pokajanje nije [prihvaćen] od onih koji [dalje] radi zlodela do kada smrt u pitanju jedan od njih, on kaže, "Zaista, ja imam se pokajao sada," ili od onih koji umiru dok su oni skeptike. Za njih smo pripremili bolna kazna.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, it is not lawful for you to inherit women by compulsion. And do not make difficulties for them in order to take [back] part of what you gave them unless they commit a clear immorality. And live with them in kindness. For if you dislike them - perhaps you dislike a thing and Allah makes therein much good.
trans-unit.target: O ti koji veruju, nije po zakonu da nasledi žene po prinuda. I ne pravi poteškoće za njih da bi se vrati [] deo šta si im osim ako počine jasno nemorala. I živi s njima u dobrotu. Ako ne volite ih - možda ne volite nešto, a Allah čini u tome mnogo dobra.

trans-unit.source: But if you want to replace one wife with another and you have given one of them a great amount [in gifts], do not take [back] from it anything. Would you take it in injustice and manifest sin?
trans-unit.target: Ali ako želite zamijeniti jednu ženu sa drugim i ti jedan od njih dao velik broj [u darovima], ne uzimajte [nazad] od toga ništa. Bi li to nepravde, a manifestuje greh?

trans-unit.source: And how could you take it while you have gone in unto each other and they have taken from you a solemn covenant?
trans-unit.target: I sad kako bi se dok idete k jedni druge, i uzeli su ti sveиani zavet?

trans-unit.source: And do not marry those [women] whom your fathers married, except what has already occurred. Indeed, it was an immorality and hateful [to Allah] and was evil as a way.
trans-unit.target: Ali ne i te žene kojima vaši očevi u braku, osim šta se već dogodila. Zaista, to je na nemoral i mrsko [Allah] i zla kao način.

trans-unit.source: Prohibited to you [for marriage] are your mothers, your daughters, your sisters, your father's sisters, your mother's sisters, your brother's daughters, your sister's daughters, your [milk] mothers who nursed you, your sisters through nursing, your wives' mothers, and your step-daughters under your guardianship [born] of your wives unto whom you have gone in. But if you have not gone in unto them, there is no sin upon you. And [also prohibited are] the wives of your sons who are from your [own] loins, and that you take [in marriage] two sisters simultaneously, except for what has already occurred. Indeed, Allah is ever Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Zabranjeno je [za brak] si tvoje majke svoje kćeri, tvoje sestre, sestre tvog oca, sestre tvoje majke, tvoga brata kćeri, tvoje sestre kćeri, vam majke [mleko] koji je pojio ga, tvoje sestre kroz starački, tvoje supruge, majke i Unionisti korak pod svoje skrbništvo [rodi] od vaših žena u kome su ušli. Ali ako ti nije išlo u im, ne postoji greh nad vama. I [takođe zabranjeni su] i supruge od tvojih sinova, koji su iz svoje [] slabine, a koji uzimate [u braku] dve sestre istovremeno, osim šta se već dogodila. Uistinu, Allah je ikada oprostiti i milostiv.

trans-unit.source: And [also prohibited to you are all] married women except those your right hands possess. [This is] the decree of Allah upon you. And lawful to you are [all others] beyond these, [provided] that you seek them [in marriage] with [gifts from] your property, desiring chastity, not unlawful sexual intercourse. So for whatever you enjoy [of marriage] from them, give them their due compensation as an obligation. And there is no blame upon you for what you mutually agree to beyond the obligation. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: I [takođe zabranjeno je da su sve] udanim ženama, osim onih koji poseduju desnu ruku. [Ovo je] dekreta Allah nad vama. Zakoniti da si [sve ostale] iza ovih, [obezbedio] [u braku] trazis ih poklonima [iz] tvoje imovine, sagledavanje chastity, nije nezakonit seksualni odnos. Dakle za zabavljaj [braka] od njih, dajte im nadoknade kao obavezu. I nema krivice na vas za međusobno pristane izvan obavezu. Uistinu, Allah je ikada znati i mudar.

trans-unit.source: And whoever among you cannot [find] the means to marry free, believing women, then [he may marry] from those whom your right hands possess of believing slave girls. And Allah is most knowing about your faith. You [believers] are of one another. So marry them with the permission of their people and give them their due compensation according to what is acceptable. [They should be] chaste, neither [of] those who commit unlawful intercourse randomly nor those who take [secret] lovers. But once they are sheltered in marriage, if they should commit adultery, then for them is half the punishment for free [unmarried] women. This [allowance] is for him among you who fears sin, but to be patient is better for you. And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: A ko od vas nije moguće [pronaći] sredstva da se uda za slobodne, verovanje žene, a onda [on možda venčati od onih protiv kojih je desnu ruku poseduje verovanja robljem. A Allah je većina znajući za tvoju veru. [Vernici] si jedno o drugome. Tako se udam za njih uz dozvolu svojih naroda i dati im nadoknade prema onome što je prihvatljivo. [Treba da budu] иednim, ni od koje poиine nezakonit odnos nasumično, niti onih koji uzimaju [tajna] ljubavnici. Ali kad su smeštene su u braku, ako oni treba da čini preljube, onda za njih pola kazna za besplatne [neudata] žene. Ovaj dodatak je za njega medju vama koji se ne boji greh, ali da budemo strpljivi bolje je za tebe. A Allah je Forgiving i milosrdna.

trans-unit.source: Allah wants to make clear to you [the lawful from the unlawful] and guide you to the [good] practices of those before you and to accept your repentance. And Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: Allah želi da ti [u zakonitu iz je nezakonit] razjasniti i vodi te do [dobre] prakse onih pred vama, kao i da prihvati tvoje pokajanje. A Allah je znajuжi i mudar.

trans-unit.source: Allah wants to accept your repentance, but those who follow [their] passions want you to digress [into] a great deviation.
trans-unit.target: Allah želi da prihvati tvoje pokajanje, ali oni koji prate [njihov] strasti ћelim da skrenem teme u super devijacijom.

trans-unit.source: And Allah wants to lighten for you [your difficulties]; and mankind was created weak.
trans-unit.target: I Allah želi da razvedri za tebe [vaše teškoće]; i ljudska vrsta bila stvorena slab.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not consume one another's wealth unjustly but only [in lawful] business by mutual consent. And do not kill yourselves [or one another]. Indeed, Allah is to you ever Merciful.
trans-unit.target: O ti koji veruju, ne troši jedan drugome bogatstva nepravedno ali samo [u zakonitu] poslovno pristankom. I ne ubijajte sami [ili jedno drugo]. Zaista, Allah je tebi ikad milostiv.

trans-unit.source: And whoever does that in aggression and injustice - then We will drive him into a Fire. And that, for Allah, is [always] easy.
trans-unit.target: I ko god to uradi u agresije i nepravde - onda vozimo ga u vatru. I to, za Alaha, [] lako je.

trans-unit.source: If you avoid the major sins which you are forbidden, We will remove from you your lesser sins and admit you to a noble entrance [into Paradise].
trans-unit.target: Da izbegavate glavni gresi koji im je zabranjeno, će ukloniti iz te manje grehova i pusti da plemeniti ulaz [u raj].

trans-unit.source: And do not wish for that by which Allah has made some of you exceed others. For men is a share of what they have earned, and for women is a share of what they have earned. And ask Allah of his bounty. Indeed Allah is ever, of all things, Knowing.
trans-unit.target: I ne žele to pomoću kojih Allah je napravio neki od vas ostali premaši. Za ljude je deo šta su zaradili, a za žene je deo šta su zaradili. I pitaj Allah od njegove nagrade. Uistinu, Allah je ikada, od svih stvari, znajuжi.

trans-unit.source: And for all, We have made heirs to what is left by parents and relatives. And to those whom your oaths have bound [to you] - give them their share. Indeed Allah is ever, over all things, a Witness.
trans-unit.target: I za sve, napravili smo naslednici šta je ostalo od strane roditelja i rodbine. I na one koje je tvoje zakletve su povezana [ti] - daj im njihov deo. Zaista Allah je ikada, iznad svih stvari, svedok.

trans-unit.source: Men are in charge of women by [right of] what Allah has given one over the other and what they spend [for maintenance] from their wealth. So righteous women are devoutly obedient, guarding in [the husband's] absence what Allah would have them guard. But those [wives] from whom you fear arrogance - [first] advise them; [then if they persist], forsake them in bed; and [finally], strike them. But if they obey you [once more], seek no means against them. Indeed, Allah is ever Exalted and Grand.
trans-unit.target: Ljudi su zadužen za žene po [pravu] Allah je dao jedan preko drugog, i šta oni provode [za održavanje] iz svoje bogatstvo. Dakle pravedne žene su pobožno poslušna, čuva u odsustvu [supruga] kako Alah neka čuva. Ali one su od koga te strah arogancija - [prvo] malo konkretniji; [tadašnja ako su uporni, ostavlja ih u krevet; [na kraju], ih i napadnite. Međutim, ako su ti [još jednom] poslušaju, tražiti sredstva protiv njih. Uistinu, Allah je ikada uzviљenom i Grand.
